name: Right Nice Party
detailed_description:
Join the conversation on Discord


Talk to the developers and other fans about Right Nice Party!


About the Game

FEATURES

  • Refreshing new take on the party board formula!
  • Fun and wacky Mini-Games that exercise all kinds of skills!
  • AI Players can fill the spots if you're not four players!
  • Right Nice Party is cross-platform compatible!


Get ready for a new kind of party! One with a colorful world, cheerful characters and a new take on the party game for the whole family. It's... Right Nice Party!

CONQUEST MODE

In the headlining game mode of Right Nice Party, four players move across the board as they use their points to take over Locations. If you own the most Locations by the end of the final round, you win! But be careful, other players can go to your Locations and spend more to take them for themselves! Additionally, crazy Items and fun Events can change things up when you least expect it! It's a refreshing new take on the classic party formula that is sure to engage you in strategic gameplay and unexpected outcomes.

MINI-GAMES!

Do you want Mini-Games? Right Nice Party has them. After every round, players engage in a Mini-Game selected at random! Some exercise skill, some you're going to have to think about and some are just plain weird! Take the thrilling rush of Rapid Reader, where you must flip your schoolbook to the correct page faster than your classmates or the spoopy halls of Ghastly Grievance where one player has to control the terrifying Ghoul and try to eat all other players before the time runs out. With a variety of team setups and fun ideas, the Mini-Games in Right Nice Party are sure to surprise and delight players of all kinds.


Anyone can join the party! Right Nice Party is playable both locally with multiple controllers or online. In fact, you can even mix the two! Two people can play on the same device while the rest of your friends join in online. Last but not least, Right Nice Party is fully cross-platform and will be released on computers, consoles and mobile devices. With a wide variety of options, you and your friends are sure to find a setup that works for you.

name: Villager comes alive
detailed_description:
The Gameplay :
- You play as a villager king, which builds up his own villager and expanding it(Villager should be able to bread in future)
- You gathering resources as wood, coal, iron, gold, diamond and corn/pumpkins from farmfields and with these you can buy
new intems/props/buildings in shop and the corn & pumpkin do you harvest to make food out of it.
- The villagers in you village need food and you need to supply them with stuff(Which you put inside the chest, so the villagers can search/take it to be able to do their jobs)

- The only job, which is currently available to deploy a village with, is the farmer, but it is planned to add the followed jobs later (Soldier, miner, lumberjack).

- There are currently no enemys in game, but zombies are planned to be added in the game soon !

name: Alien Extraction Demo
detailed_description:
There's a big alien mess and somebody's gotta clean it up...

Control an alien infested space station from the safety of your security desk in this funny, brain bending strategy game. Guide the station janitor, Lenny, through dangerous winding levels and solve the station's mysteries along the way.


Use every tool at your disposal

  • Scour video feeds for alien movement or lost clues
  • Pilot drones to explore, distract aliens and lead Lenny to safety
  • Control the facility from the comfort of your security desk
  • Traverse the facility minimap; just don’t trust it
  • Attempt to mute the station AI when it starts insulting you...

Outsmart the aliens...

...or just burn them to a crisp! Aliens can hear, see and smell Lenny; it’s your job to make sure these wily beasts don’t get too close. Outsmart them with trickery and distraction, outrun them with quick reactions and tactics or out...burn them with flamethrowers; it’s really up to you.

Defeat the baddie

Some smart guy thought it would be a good idea to upload Terminator 2 to the station’s media database. Unfortunately, the facility AI enjoyed the movie a bit too much and went rogue, releasing all of the alien specimens and generally causing a big mess. Luckily for you, Lenny the janitor is here and big messes are his speciality. Alien Extraction contains a fully voice acted, lighthearted narrative to take back the station and reboot the evil AI.

Guide Lenny the janitor through deadly and dangerous levels: sneak, burn, distract, pilot, blast and clean his way to safety. Control drones, check cameras and complete puzzles to solve the station's mysteries.

name: Lights, Camera, Reaction! IRL Edition
detailed_description:
Experience the fun of all your favorite timeless party games together!


Lights, Camera, Reaction! IRL Edition is a couch-style multiplayer party game for PC! Compete head to head in 2D and 3D mini-games with 3-8 players. Your phone (or tablet) is your controller in this PC party game!

Featuring 10 Game Modes

  • Meme Me - Caption a random photo with top and bottom meme text then rate each others masterpieces
  • Act Natural - Act out a random words as the party leader while the other players try to guess
  • Picture This - Draw random words while the other players try to guess
  • Jelly Royale - Compete head-to-head in this 2D side scrolling brawler
  • Use Your Words - Describe a random word as the party leader while other players try to guess
  • Mountain Madness - Battle against other mountain goat players until only one remains
  • The Claw - Avoid capture by the party leader's claw as other players attack each other and dodge obstacles
  • Hipster Run - Run and hurdle obstacles while avoiding the Fibster head
  • Cock Block - Make eggs with the hen for points while the party leader tries to cock block
  • U add, bro? - Solve quick math problems as fast as possible

How to Play

  • Launch the game on your PC and create a party room
  • Each player uses their phone (or tablet) as a controller to connect to the party and play the game
  • Each player creates an avatar by drawing a face, uploading an image, or taking a selfie
  • Select 1-3 fun-filled game modes per match
  • Compete for the highest score!

For the Best Experience

  • Launch the game from a desktop PC or laptop connected to TV, projector, or other large display
  • Wireless keyboard & mouse (or trackpad)
  • Strong internet / wireless connection
  • Comfy seating!
  • Medium to large room (with space for players to act out words)

Your phone (or tablet) is your controller. Draw and act out words, battle in retro side-scrollers, cock block friends, and more!

name: The Wanderer: Chosen One
detailed_description:
Explore the kingdom and restore it to its former glory

After years of The Guardians' betrayal on the kingdom, after years of self exile... You decide it's time to fulfill your destiny and become The Chosen One

The Wanderer: Chosen One it's a 2.5D sidescroller action adventure that combines 3D environments and handmade pixel art for characters and enemies. Explore different levels, unlock hidden magic, control the power of the elements and overcome every challenge that's put on your way.

Game Features

  • Tight 2D controllers that let you perform complex and precise movement. Teleport, cast spells, hit and run your way across the kingdom.
  • Explore different levels and find hidden abilities and relics to enhance your power and capabilities.
  • Over 20 enemies and 10 epic bosses and mini-bosses, fight your way against The Guardians forces and prove your skill and power.
  • Obtain new elemental powers every time you defeat a boss. Control the power of the elements and destroy your foes.
  • Complete the game and unlock Battle Arena Mode. Prove yourself worthy and combat The Guardian forces in the arena.

short_description: The Wanderer: Chosen One is an epic fantasy 2.5D action platformer about bretrayal and justice. Explore different kingdoms, battle againts the fallen guardians and restore order all by yourself. Forge your destiny and follow the path of the ancient magic bestowed on you... The Chosen One.

name: Off-Road Farming
detailed_description:
Off-Road Farming is an unusual off-road farming simulator. In the game you will find unique locations, interesting levels, as well as various weather phenomena!

Go through well-developed locations with beautiful graphics. Drive along muddy roads and rivers, as well as other obstacles that you can't always get through the first time! Get ready for muddy, forested and snowy environments, prove that you can stand up to any circumstances.

Game Features:
- Excellent physics
- Weather effects (snow, rain, thunder)
- Dynamic trees
- Various tasks

name: Shrine of Tails
detailed_description:
The world has long ceased to be what it used to be. Once on the doorstep of an ancient shrine, you feel a surge of strength. There are 5 girls inside waiting for you. Touch them and fix the humanity (your private life). Take part in exciting mini-games, find ancient artifacts and communicate with the girls with amazing tails. The temple and the Shrine of Tails characters are waiting for you!

■ Gameplay ■


    ● Defeat the girls in an entertaining "Rock-Paper-Scissors" mini-game and get access to their nudity and sex scenes
    ● Find ancient artifacts hidden in the darkest corners of the Shrine
    ● Chat with girls and earn their favor in dialogues

■ Story ■


Uncover the secret of the mysterious Shrine by finding a use for the artifact you brought with. Cold corridors of dark fantasy are waiting for you, intertwined with the warm fountain of a romantic visual novel. The non-linear spirit of the story will allow you to feel it to the fullest.

■ Game features ■


    ● Gallery mode filled with dozens of illustrations
    ● 4 female characters
    ● Non-linear history
    ● Mini-games: "rock-paper-scissors" and hidden objects

name: Warden of the Arcaen
detailed_description:
Warden of the Arcaen is a dating sim style visual novel. The player will get to choose between dating men or women at the beginning of the game, play as 'Friends to Lovers' OR 'Enemies to Lovers'. Immerse yourself in this modern fantasy world and explore magical relationships!



Story:

You are going to visit your Uncle Charlie after your nightmares worsen, and you think he may be able to help. He has studied the folklore behind monsters known as 'Arcaen' his whole life. But when you arrive, it seems the Arcaen aren't just stories. . . Getting to know them is the now part of your job, and balancing those relations- won't always be easy. . .



Features:

Customizable Player Name
21 Complete Endings
5 Romanceable Characters (For Both Male & Female Presenting)
Friends to Lovers Routes
Enemies to Lovers Routes
Vampires, Werewolves, Fae, Gargoyles, & Witches
Completed Game
175,000 + Words
Turn On / Off Mature Content
Descriptive Romance Scenes
Many Choices Throughout
And so much more!



What are the 'Arcaen'?

As you play you get to unpack the mystery of the 'Arcaen', a name grouping together the Vampires, Werewolves, the Fae, Witches, & Gargoyles in this game.



Meet The Characters

You will notice characters that there are male and female versions of each character. You get to choose which at the beginning of the game.

Aspen: A Fae, who enjoys a bit mischief as much as a bit of gardening.

Taylor: A Gargoyle, who has sworn to protect your family for generations, whether you like it or not.

Logan: A Werewolf, hoping to make a friend in this divided community.

Morgan: A Witch, who is sometimes out of touch with the world outside of magical society.

Beck: A Vampire, a hopeless flirt who wishes your family would stop roping him into their problems.

name: Ninjas Against the Machines
detailed_description:
The world is depending on you, Ninja! Powerful machines have traveled through time to destroy all of humanity! Equipped with your bo staff, your javelin, and your wits, you must take the machines head on, utilizing any and all futuristic technology you can find along the way.

Key Features:
  • Unique Challenges - Ninjas Against the Machines uses a unique challenge system for permanent upgrades like health, damage, and unlocks. No longer do you need to farm in order to earn those upgrades - your skills are put to the test!
  • Over 30 Enhancements - On each run, you can choose one enhancement to take with you. As you collect coins during a run, you can purchase them to give you an edge in battle.
  • Platform Like a Ninja - The world in which the machines have created is a challenging place. Luckily you have you javelin, climbing spikes, air/ground dash attack, and more to help traverse its dangerous nature.
  • Randomly Generated Stages - Each time you initiate a new run, all stages are randomly compiled out of premade bits so your playthrough is never identical.
  • Even MORE Challenges - Completing your first run opens up new opportunities and challenges.
  • Race Against the Clock - Your time for all run types are saved on the steam leaderboards - can you beat the game with the fastest time?
about_the_game:
The world is depending on you, Ninja! Powerful machines have traveled through time to destroy all of humanity! Equipped with your bo staff, your javelin, and your wits, you must take the machines head on, utilizing any and all futuristic technology you can find along the way.

Key Features:
  • Unique Challenges - Ninjas Against the Machines uses a unique challenge system for permanent upgrades like health, damage, and unlocks. No longer do you need to farm in order to earn those upgrades - your skills are put to the test!
  • Over 30 Enhancements - On each run, you can choose one enhancement to take with you. As you collect coins during a run, you can purchase them to give you an edge in battle.
  • Platform Like a Ninja - The world in which the machines have created is a challenging place. Luckily you have you javelin, climbing spikes, air/ground dash attack, and more to help traverse its dangerous nature.

name: Oscar's Paradise
detailed_description:
Oscar is on his dream journey to collect as many scraps as he can. Join him on a fast paced 3D marble game inspired by many before it.
Join Oscar on his fast paced journey as he rushes to get his scraps

Features

There is currently more than 40 stages for Oscar to rush though with many difficult challenges along the way.


There is also a challenge mode where you will have to reach the end before the timer runs out, will you be able to do it?

name: Grim Tales: Graywitch Collector's Edition
detailed_description:
Elephant Games proudly presents the newest installment of the Grim Tales series!

While researching her family’s history, your relative was pulled back in time! It’s up to you to travel into the past to find her, but it won’t be easy. There’s a mysterious monster on the prowl and the town’s history remains a mystery. Can you uncover the identity of the monster and rescue your friend in time? Find out in this exhilarating hidden-object puzzle adventure!

This is a special Collector’s Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Play as Victor and stop an evil cult in the bonus chapter!
• Earn achievements and find hidden collectibles and morphing objects.
• Unlock the secret room to test your skills!
• Enjoy concept art, wallpapers, screensavers, soundtrack and more!
• Never get lost with the strategy guide.

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

name: Aria
detailed_description:
Aria is a narrative-driven adventure game following a young girl - Aria and her travelling companion, a “Dolki” (Half Dolphin, half Kiwi). A recent tragedy has left Aria adrift in her own imagination where corruption has begun to intrude upon the lands. Only bringing together the lost pendant pieces can save her world and its citizens.

Go at your own pace while gliding through the surreal environments by zooming through at breakneck speeds, or by taking your time to enjoy the sights. Slower paced swimming provides a peaceful interlude to play in the slow swaying kelp or with the schools of fish.

Featuring hand-painted environments and an orchestral soundtrack, Aria delivers a heart-stirring and unique experience.

name: Mare
detailed_description:
As you wake up, stirred from a dreamless sleep with an unknown purpose, you find yourself in the strange lands of Mare embodying a mysterious artificial bird.

Crossing paths with a helpless companion you venture deep into unknown territory on a puzzling adventure while unraveling a mysterious narrative and the secrets hidden within. All in order to ensure the arrival of the companion at her impending destiny.

  • Explore the vast and strange landscapes by the means of an artificial bird.
  • Guide and protect a vulnerable AI companion on her unexpected adventure.
  • Let the curiosity of the companion inspire you to explore and discover the underlying narrative spanning over 8 chapters.
  • Immerse yourself in the ambient atmosphere and otherworldly music for a soothing experience.
  • Search for lost artifacts hidden throughout the world in order to unlock the final secret of Mare.

REVIEWS



Upload VR: Winner of 2021 Upload Awards - Hidden Gem. Mare is a breathless beauty of a VR game – simplistic in its progression perhaps but never anything less than astonishing to take in.

The VR Grid: It’s not about the destination, but the journey as they say, and Mare is one helluva journey. From the opening moments of the game, all the way to it’s conclusion, I was enamored by the presentation and the story.

Mare is nothing short of breathtaking and a welcome change of pace to the to action-packed, fast-paced titles I have been playing of late. Its a strikingly beautiful yet solemn adventure that pushes you ever forward toward the unknown.

6DOF Reviews: Mare is a title I can easily recommend to anybody who has an appreciation for beauty and mystery. It evokes a mood unlike any I’ve experienced in VR.. It may be brief, but its impact will far outlive its duration, proving beyond a doubt that it’s the quality of our experiences that matter, and not their duration.

Mare is a class act from start to finish. It's a macabre and mysterious adventure that offers a haunting experience that long outlives its light puzzles and relatively brief playtime.

VR Focus:A puzzle experience with beautiful scenery and a mysterious plotline all about a girl who needs your help. The barren environment coupled with the superb musical score ensures Mare has an ambience and soul few VR projects achieve.

name: Mina the Hollower
detailed_description:
Descend into a frightful world of action-adventure in Mina the Hollower. Take control of Mina, a renowned Hollower hurtled into a desperate mission to rescue a cursed island. Burrow beneath hazards and monsters, whip foes into oblivion, and gear up with an arsenal of sidearms and trinkets. Explore a vast world filled with pixel-perfect graphics, masterful gameplay, beastly bosses, and infectious music. Encounter a cast of bizarre characters, search out secrets in an array of exotic locales, and illuminate the omnipresent darkness in Mina the Hollower, a brand new game from the developers who brought you Shovel Knight!

Features
  • Hauntingly authentic 8-bit visuals in the style of Game Boy Color, refined for the modern era.
  • Modern touches abound: detailed animation, widescreen visuals, and rock-solid controls!
  • Leap, dodge, and burrow through the ground to battle monsters or navigate the world.
  • Lash at foes with your trusty whip, Nightstar- or choose from an arsenal of weapons, each with a totally different move set.
  • Discover and utilize a reliquary's worth of unusual Sidearms to gain the advantage in combat.
  • Collect and equip Trinkets to acquire a variety of exotic effects. Level Mina up to suit your unique playstyle.
  • Electrifying MSX-style soundtrack by chiptune virtuoso, Jake Kaufman.
  • Descend into the depths of madness with a bone-chilling, yet heartwarming tale inspired by Victorian Gothic horror.
  • Explore a huge, dark world brimming with secrets, challenging battles, and interconnected level design.

name: The Perished
detailed_description:
Desperate to rescue his daughter, Eric Preston journeys to a cabin deep in the Canadian wilderness to discover an ancient evil that awaits his arrival.

Assuming the role of this desperate father, players are tasked with solving the the mystery of his daughter's disappearance while warding off the evils that have been unleashed. Faced with tense stealth and close quarters combat, players must collect clues and solve puzzles to discover the truth that lies behind this cabin.

Will you save your daughter in time or will her suffering mean the end of days?

name: Illusion
detailed_description:
It was only after I and my buddies escaped from the terrifying laboratory that I realized that there might be a bigger conspiracy behind it.
The adventure is far from over,
But don't forget, what's happening here is just the beginning.

game introduction


Illusion is a game based on adventure puzzle solving and role-playing.
Players need to collect props and crack the mechanisms throughout the game scene to complete the game. In some levels, players need to control other auxiliary characters to complete the puzzle-solving task together, and finally escape from the dangerous laboratory.
In addition, each big scene will set a goal, and only after completing a specific goal can you enter the next scene.
As you venture out to solve puzzles, you'll also meet new furry friends who will join you in getting through the tough times.
Every choice you make in the game will set off a butterfly effect, which will then determine the direction of the game's plot and scene puzzle solving, and even the direction and even the ending of the entire game.
But the ultimate goal is to escape from this laboratory.

name: CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 Personality Pack Guarded, Blunt Girl
detailed_description:
An all new heroine type, the "Blunt Girl" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D 2!
You can now hire “Blunt” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

～Who is this Blunt Girl?～
A cautious, guarded girl with a slightly (?) sharp tongue. She won't turn that sharp tongue on just anyone, though; she keeps it reserved for sexual harassers and perpetrators of other inappropriate behaviors. Because of the her guarded nature, it's hard to get friendly with her, and her attitude is typically blunt and curt to the point where it's impossible to imagine her having a softer side. She'll even get into spats with other women over the finer details of what constitutes "correct behavior," and she applies her standards for correctness fairly, equally, and without prejudice. Why exactly she came to the Empire Club is shrouded in mystery. Will you get her to warm up to you, or will she continue to hate you? It all depends on what attitude you take towards her.
• You can enjoy training, job communication, and scenes as a maid working in the Empire Club with Guarded, Blunt Girl!
• Playable events are available before becoming a lover with Guarded, Blunt Girl, such as a love story and events where Guarded, Blunt Girl interacts with other maids!

“Blunt” is not yet compatible with the following additional DLC’s.
Blunt is not compatible with the same DLC’s as “Sweet Little Devil,” so please note before purchasing.
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

Our next planned release is to make Blunt compatible with these three separate DLCs , please wait a little longer.
Even in Japan, the development of GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb differs depending on the heroine type.
The translation work will be done after Japan develops them. We hope you understand that this will take some time.
We are working to release it as soon as possible, so please be patient.

name: PARACHUTER
detailed_description:
《PARACHUTER》is a turn-based shooting game with a strategic nature. Make moves by utilizing a limited number of moves, and then defeat a variety of enemies in the right position. Players will fight in various environments to escape this ridiculous world alive.
Background story:
In 2560, if World War I was held. Joshi Kol is doing skydiving as usual.
Suddenly, a light shined on Kol's face in the air. Kol consciously closed his eyes, but when he reopened, a mysterious space appeared.
There was a strange sound in the head of the call. This is God's play.
He is the prey of this game chosen by God. To make him a little more alive, God gave him a gravity maneuver.
The direction of gravity can be changed by the gravity control device.
However, this device has been used many times.
The winner of the game gets a chance to return to the original world. Kol decided to break through the siege and return to the original world.

name: Zoo Tales
detailed_description:
Not recommended

Zoo Lore 0.7: Version is subject to playability and playability, not recommended to purchase at this stage. Version 0.7 contains only experimental content and almost no playable content. Therefore, if you want to play with your family and friends, please wait for the update to the official version of the game. Note: The current version contains experimental content only and is not recommended for purchase


About the Game

Choose the best strategy, get supplies, and win. Survive, kill, fight the mysteries of the unknown, and experience undifferentiated strategic contests. 《Zoo Tales》 offers an exciting story and brings you a new multiplayer competitive experience. You walked into the zoo in this city. It claims to include the vast majority of species suitable for zoo feeding in the world. You thought it would be an ordinary and pleasant distraction. Other tourists around you laughing and chatting think so. Keep away from the rabbit. Don't break the rules. Believe in human beings. Stick to yourself. Keep calm and remember all the information that can help you. We must fight bravely ——And escape the zoo alive. You will play the role of a tourist, an employee, or some strange messenger to seek survival in this abnormal zoo. Do you want to obey the rules? Which one should you choose? Or make a choice with your own judgment? —— Choose what you believe is right and defeat what you believe is wrong. See the truth and defend the dignity of life. ——"Unity, courage and unwavering loyalty are the greatest virtues of mankind."

name: Tartaria: The forgotten tale
detailed_description:
Tartaria is an adventure game about a young prince. It takes place in a fantasy world where ancient Russian myths come alive.
In the beginning of the story you set off to a sage to master a sword-based martial art, magic and become very agile. You use this knowledge to find the reason why dark force gets into the people’s world and to finally defend your home land.

And you must remember — every world have its own rules...



The game’s mechanics and story:

  • Fights using various weapons and magic, as well as tactical movements, blocks and dodges. The main character and enemies use attacks of different strength, speed and range.

  • Dynamic system of enemy behavior. For example, your actions can frighten the enemy and he will run away.

  • In addition to combat episodes, the game has many quests and tasks that will allow you to immerse yourself in Slavic culture and get acquainted with interesting traditions.

  • You have to move between the world of people and the magical world of dark forces. The hero will meet many mythical creatures of Russian fairy tales and legends.

  • The environment and atmosphere of the game are inspired by the most beautiful Russian nature.

name: Cubytet
detailed_description:
Cubytet is a 3D puzzle game in which you need to place pieces of different shapes on the playing field in order to score as many points as possible. This game is based on the world's most famous 2D puzzle game and is its 3D analog with some additional game mechanics!

The player can freely rotate the camera around the playing field and view it from different angles. The game has 2 difficulty levels and 12 different pieces.

When the horizontal panel is completely filled with cubes, this panel will be removed from the playing field, and the player will be awarded points. The player receives points for the following actions:
  • 5 points - placing a piece on the playing field;
  • 100 points - filling one panel with cubes;
  • 400 points - filling two panels with cubes at the same time;
  • 900 points - filling three panels with cubes at the same time;
  • 1600 points - filling four panels with cubes at the same time.

The speed of the game will increase over time and decrease when the panels are removed.

The game has a leaderboard that will allow players to find out their current rank among all players in the world, as well as compete for first place.

Unique game mechanics

The constructor:

This mechanic allows the player to add and remove additional cubes to the next piece. This makes the gameplay more interesting and diverse, and also helps the player to get out of a difficult situation.

The cut:

This mechanic allows the player to make the cubes translucent to look inside the playing field. In addition, those areas of the playing field that are currently completely inaccessible will be highlighted in yellow. This simplifies orientation on the playing field and helps the player to make a decision faster.

name: OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script -Vol.2-
detailed_description:
OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script
Winner of 8 International Accolades

“Then... are you also able to sense its flow from my performance?”
“As long as I focus, then yes, I can hear you clearly.”

Every deceivingly insignificant utterance is an exquisitely crafted puzzle piece that uncovers the story’s true ending.

What makes OPUS: Echo of Starsong so unique is its layered storytelling. As the saying goes, "There is more here than meets the eye", for the text does not stop at the surface level. There are multiple layers of meaning, and this is what allows the story to keep on giving. This approach to writing strings together the entire text, allowing layers of emotion to build towards a final crescendo through rich metaphors and symbolism. This is precisely what has initiated passionate discussions among players. OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script fully lays out these meticulous twists and turns, peeling back layer after layer. How much foreshadowing can you find?

Features


- Vol. 1 & Vol. 2, total 200+ pages
- 5 chapters of the main storyline
- Exclusive Myrian translations
- Selected CGs to relive those unforgettable memories

Highly Recommended by Players


"Even if you have a pretty good sense of where the story's headed, it'll still move you."

"After completing the game, I went back and took another look at those lines I had simply browsed through. All the questions I had, the details I didn't pick up on, and the dialogues that echo the ending... they all threw me back into the vastness of lumen."

"I'm definitely going to dive back into this story, making sure to read every single line closely... To experience once again the touching nature of Echo of Starsong."

"An expansive worldview and a story that follows each climactic moment with another. There's just no way to put it down!"

"Never expected to be sucked into the story after opening the game..."

* Since the game's story is so large, this book only contains material related to the main storyline.
* Contains both English and Chinese versions.


OPUS: Echo of Starsong Official Game Script Vol. 1
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1856570

name: 100 Days without delays
detailed_description:
In this Match3 game you have to help the young heroine Lee Milton manage her task to setup a successful new airport in a neighboring state - in mere 100 days! Collect three colorful items in a row, upgrade the airport, even help police to solve the crime, and she will become the youngest airport manager in a company’s history!

- 100 game levels!
- 30 building upgrades!
- Captivating story
- "Moves", "countdown", and "relaxed" playing modes!
- Fillable boosters!
- Square matches!

name: JUST HOOPS Demo
detailed_description:
The old-school arcade basketball experience meets new-school virtual technology in JUST HOOPS!

Welcome to our free demo.

Take the live-action of arcade basketball into your living room with the first-ever reality-simulated shoot-the-hoop game! Inspired by 80’s arcade basketball, JUST HOOPS is an immersive gaming experience that features multiple play modes, challenges, and more than 45 levels of changing hoops! Using state-of-the-art technology that utilizes the actual physics behind grabbing and shooting a ball, JUST HOOPS’ new and innovative features optimize gameplay for the most dynamic VR basketball experience possible.

Compete against friends for bragging rights, enjoy hoop time with family, or play to climb the world leaderboard. Targets change at every increasing level, from traditional coin-op baskets to animated hoops like snakes, space invaders, rotating hoops with closing lids and more!

name: Runner Party
detailed_description:
A great tournament is organized in the brand new gameroom : Runner Party!



Come and challenge players from all over the world in this ultra dynamic "runner & platformer" through rich environments from Pop culture !

Train to master all the necessary techniques to dare and participate in ranked games and thus join the most prestigious leagues in the championship !

Power-ups, projectiles, traps, obstacles, everything will be done to give you or take away the victory !

In this game you are the champion: win and collect cards to get new skins!

Customize your character !

Show you're the best by earning amazing rewards that will make your opponents jealous !

Become a legend ! 3 ! 2 ! 1 ! Go !

name: Fluids & Sounds: Mind relaxing and meditative
detailed_description:
--- Fluids & Sounds 2021: Magic mind relaxing game ---
Are you stressed or feel some anxiety in you? You want to be an artist and create beautiful art with ease? You are just looking for something which calms you down and makes you relaxed?
I think this will be the perfect app for you! This magical, glowing fluid simulation is here to release the stress from your life now!

--- Features of Magic fluid simulation 2021: Mind relaxing game ---
✅ Fluid simulation with dozens of parameters to play around with (color, bloom, sunrays, resolution, force, and more)
✅ Sound synthesis designed for meditating, stress-relieving music
✅ Take screenshots and share them with anyone you like
✅ Record videos (please note: the fluid sounds are not recorded, only the background music. Also the UI is excluded from recording, so you'll only record what matters - your art)
✅ Save and load your favorite settings using presets
✅ Trippy and easy fluid explorer/editor app with simple UI/UX
✅ Real-time fluid art viewer with colorful and psychedelic impressions on your screen

--- Take it as a colorful, psychedelic therapy ---
Take it as a therapy which hopefully will have a positive effect on your daily life. You can tap or swipe on the screen to create trippy, psychedelic looking fluids. These fluids will help you to focus, relax and meditate. On top of that, I added some real-time sound synthesis, which makes this experience unforgettable. Let the fluids flow your stress away! The relaxing fluid simulation app will bring new colors in your life. It's really a psychedelic experience, like seeing some of those glowing, geometric pieces of art in front of you. You can see different combinations of eye-catching colors created by this magic glow liquid fluid app. Pour out your little mind on the mobile screen and so some crazy creative art aesthetics. Believe it or not! You will love to play this color magic glow fluid app. You will fall in love with the experience you get! The new stress releasing crazy kids fluid simulation app!
Are you ready to feel the satisfaction of creative freedom and its impact on your mental wellbeing? The new fluid art meditation and stimulation app is here for you. Enjoy breathtaking art patterns and soulful music till you feel calm and relaxed. Download and use Fluids and Sounds today!

Fluid simulations are one of the best visual, psychedelic looking fx experiences you can get. Indulge into a magic world where you can make anything flow with a magic touch of liquid. Enjoy hypnotizing, magic colors and fluids in this stress-relieving simulator. You can calm down, relieve stress and meditate by painting swirly liquids or flowing water with that math-based fluidsim.
Seek awareness and peace within the minute you open this app and make the most out of your free time with this free, wonderful, and trippy app. Hope you'll enjoy, because we believe you deserve to feel calm and relaxed!
Please don't forget to share this app if you like it! Perhaps your friends are already waiting to see this new magic fluids game!

--- Feedback ---
We value your feedback!
Contact us if you have any suggestions about our Magic fluid simulation 2021: Mind relaxing game. We always appreciate user feedback and must act on it. Last but not least: don’t forget to rate us better, thanks!
- Best regards Marvin

name: The Haunted Grounds
detailed_description:
Welcome to The Haunted Grounds,

You are in a flooded Village alone, No one knows how you got there but their is someone or some unknown entity watching you.

Your main mission is to find VHS Tapes, Notes. Scattered around the Map without getting caught by the unknown entity, There are locked chests, doors That you must find a code/key to unlock.

Somewhere in the map there is items, to try and kill the Unknown entity.

There are Interactable Objects you can pick up such as Axes, Flashlights, Boxes and more

NOTE This game is a environment based game and is not a full Haunted Game.

Please note, This is my First Project on Steam, Expect some bugs and glitches I will fix them, I will be doing regular updates of the game, If you have any Issues? You can go to the Support Section and send a Email. Currently the Game is in Early Access! This is not the full version of the game! Full Version expected to be Released on (STEAM PLANNED RELEASE DATE) Thanks for your Patience.

Current Build: (In mainmenu screen)

- Exploration and completion challenge.
- Multiplayer Will be added once the game has fully been released.
- Early Access
- Cheap Price (Reason for low Price since its still in Development and isn't the Full Release)
- Windows Supported
- Game has Graphics Settings (Low, Med, High, Ultra)
- May add VR Support for SteamVR and Oculus after final Release (Oculus SDK V1.3 and Above, HTC Vive and other VR Headsets)

short_description: Introducing, "The Haunted Grounds" - a new and upcoming indie horror game, developed by BA747 and made in the Unity game engine. The Haunted Grounds is targeted for PC platforms, with ultra realistic graphics. It provides a new take on the psychological horror genre, with stunning graphics.

name: Line War Demo
detailed_description:
This is a Steam Next Fest Demo of Line War.

Line War is a multiplayer Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game heavily influenced by other strategy genres including 4X, War Game, Auto Battler, and Real-Time Tactics.

  • Endless number of asymmetric procedural worlds
  • Players select their starting territories in an innovative and fair "picking phase"
  • You draw commands that units will follow
  • Reduced micro-management, Actions per Minute (APM) is not important
  • No control of individual units, they all follow commands and directives
  • Traditional, recognizable, and well balanced militaristic units
  • Conquer territories, build towns, cities, industries, ports, and trade routes to earn capital
  • Produce energy with refineries and powerplants for sustained mobility of tanks, air force, and navy

  • Visual commands

    This game has a never-before-seen approach that lets you focus on drawing commands and executing a strategy rather than managing individual units. Chain commands and execute orchestrated operations for coordinated attacks against your opponent. This command system sets Line War apart from other strategy games.

  • Familiar Units

    Line War dares to break the trend and has only one race with familiar units to widen the audience and ease the learning curve. Each unit has a distinct and carefully balanced role.

  • Strategy

    Line War focuses on strategy. We've designed the game around the typical RTS-problems to remove the steep learning curve and need for ultra-fast micro-management so you can focus on planning and executing a strategy.
    During Early Access; Line War is a multiplayer-only game! We will add single-player campaigns for the full release in 2023. As an Early Access customer, you will receive the single-player campaigns for free once the game is fully released.
about_the_game:
This is a Steam Next Fest Demo of Line War.

Line War is a multiplayer Real-Time Strategy (RTS) game heavily influenced by other strategy genres including 4X, War Game, Auto Battler, and Real-Time Tactics.

  • Endless number of asymmetric procedural worlds
  • Players select their starting territories in an innovative and fair "picking phase"
  • You draw commands that units will follow
  • Reduced micro-management, Actions per Minute (APM) is not important
  • No control of individual units, they all follow commands and directives
  • Traditional, recognizable, and well balanced militaristic units
  • Conquer territories, build towns, cities, industries, ports, and trade routes to earn capital
  • Produce energy with refineries and powerplants for sustained mobility of tanks, air force, and navy

  • Visual commands

    This game has a never-before-seen approach that lets you focus on drawing commands and executing a strategy rather than managing individual units. Chain commands and execute orchestrated operations for coordinated attacks against your opponent. This command system sets Line War apart from other strategy games.

  • Familiar Units

    Line War dares to break the trend and has only one race with familiar units to widen the audience and ease the learning curve. Each unit has a distinct and carefully balanced role.

  • Strategy

    Line War focuses on strategy. We've designed the game around the typical RTS-problems to remove the steep learning curve and need for ultra-fast micro-management so you can focus on planning and executing a strategy.
    During Early Access; Line War is a multiplayer-only game! We will add single-player campaigns for the full release in 2023. As an Early Access customer, you will receive the single-player campaigns for free once the game is fully released.
short_description: A new type of multiplayer RTS-style game with elements from 4X, Wargame, Auto Battler, and Real-Time Tactics genres. Draw commands and execute a superior strategy to win over your opponent without the need for micro-management.

name: 黎明为歌 - Melody before the Dawn
detailed_description:
关于我们

玩家群：894964809（供玩家交流ww遇到种问题也可以来反馈！）
游戏开发者微博：@符绾_Retsu

可以点击上方【发行商】一栏，进入我们的主页。
关注我们，即可获取更多后续游戏相关消息哦~


About the Game


居住在极北之地的少女瑟里卡，每晚都会在睡梦中进入另一个世界——
这里有着她未曾见过的风景，鲜活的友人，以及一场奇迹般的邂逅。
懵懂的感情为之觉醒，却被提醒一切只是幻梦……
梦与现实究竟有什么联系，她们的命运又会发生怎样的转变呢？
迷雾笼罩身周，她将舒展梦境的羽翼，为黎明献上歌唱。

这是一款较为轻松的剧情向解谜游戏，你将扮演瑟里卡在这个世界中度过新年前的七天。
你需要翻越雪山、穿过森林，也会遇到一些阻碍。
本作游戏时长约为8~10小时，共有三个结局。
请拨开纠缠的迷雾，寻找世界的真相吧！








使用鼠标或方向键进行移动
空格/z/Enter 确认/进行调查
Esc/x 取消/打开菜单

※地图上有一些可收集物，把它们送给合适的人，可以了解到更多的信息。
※试试仔细观察地图，也许有一些线索帮助你找到前进的道路。
※遇到卫兵的搜查记得及时存档，被他们抓到可不是什么好事情。

部分玩法内容预览：






制作人：符绾
编剧：敏纳娄什、睡不醒的虾米
文案优化协助：双尾喵喵
美术：符绾、SuikaXD、百合子
音乐：Music by Eric Matyas soundimage
发行：梦结界工作室

name: The Blunderbuss
detailed_description:
The blunderbuss is an open world video game that consists of guiding the character through 3 people, shooting, climbing walls and, above all, stealing vehicles while moving through a country inspired by Latin America.
In this video game you will be able to buy weapons, bullets, clothes and you will have an inventory to be able to carry out the missions of the game and finish the story.

In an environment of aggression, drugs, alcohol and sex, this great story unfolds.
Summary of what the story was about:

The blunderbuss (El trabucazo) is a fascinating and powerful bomb created by the most powerful and secretive cartel in the Dominican Republic. This organization has managed to circumvent the Caribbean maritime authorities for decades. Due to the ambition of their leader, they involve Eduardo, a common man, poor, impulsive, raised from the strata of the hot neighborhood. His ephemeral participation lasted longer than expected. Now he must find a way to prevent the detonation of that unique bomb to protect his loved ones. He relies on his friends, but must dirty his hands with criminal acts to achieve his goal despite the tarnishing of his name and the casualties that fall in his way. All this must be achieved before the... Blunderbuss!

name: Wonderbirds
detailed_description:
This world is in danger. The islands go under water. The birdfolk have flown away.
But the eggs of unhatched nestlings remained on these islands.

Only our heroes can save everyone.
The five Wonderbirds will pass through all adventures, fight off predatory animals and save poor feather kids.

Wonderbirds, save the wonderful nestlings!



Wonderbirds is an action puzzle game in the spirit of the old Lemmings.
The chicks hatch from the eggs on the islands and start walking towards the rescue airship. On the way they will have many predators.
You play as a miracle bird that can make paths or dig channels. So you can pave the way for the chicks, make it safer. You can also stun predators, block their way. Being close to the chicks, you take them under protection. Different miracle birds also have different magical abilities that will allow the chicks to get out of this mess faster.

  • Five characters
  • Five main biomes
  • Dozens of NPC types
  • Different gameplay - from hurricane action to think a liittle puzzles

Have a good game!

name: A Pigeon Detective Game: Twin Beaks
detailed_description:
A Pigeon Detective Game: Twin Beaks is a murder-mystery novel game set in an idyllic tourist village. Meet the prime suspects as you question them about their alibis, and gather all of their saucy secrets. Your case seems simple, a body found at dawn belonging to the village's delivery pigeon, Bobert Squab... yet what lies underneath this humble town is darkness and intrigue.

  • Meet and interview your suspects, unlocking dialogue as you find out more info from other pigeons and the environment around you.


  • Explore in a 3rd-person perspective as you rollerskate around the village of Twin Beaks.


You alone have the power to find out what really happened that fateful night, and bring the right pigeon to justice.

name: The Star Legation Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The Original Soundtrack (OST) for The Star Legation was composed by professional guitarist and composer, Andy Mitchell.

Description: All music is synthesized and recorded with a Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) and can be described as a blend between techno, rock, and classical styles to fit the scifi genre of The Star Legation game.

Included:
* 40 of Andy's original compositions written and arranged for The Star Legation game, with a total runtime of 99 minutes and 35 seconds.
* Album cover art
* 9 pages of composer's notes detailing the background and inspiration for each selection
* Links to 10 of the compositions with audio recordings of Andy performing them on guitar, alongside sheet music for skilled guitarists (available on the website)

name: Hentai Student
detailed_description:
History

Alice is a 19 year old female student. Studied at the Faculty of Journalism. And she needs your help in finding the right book to write a report on one of the subjects.

Gameplay

Hentai Student is a trivial visual novel and casual puzzle game with a beautiful girl.

Pass levels, open new scenes, go through the story.

In each new scene, the appearance of the girl will change to an increasingly erotic one and new details of the story will be revealed.

Levels can include quests such as clicker, puzzles or tetris.

Features

Card Collection

Beautiful Images

name: Mori
detailed_description:
MORI is DEAD
But as long as that upsets you, you can avenge yourself.
Not much is known about your killer, and even less about the mysterious, shifting desert where they left your bones.

Features:

  • A modular Lemat revolver
  • Over 40 upgrade items that make each run unique
  • A talking snake to sell them to you
  • Rage inducing enemies
  • Sand
  • Secrets

name: Knightlife
detailed_description:
Knightlife is an open world rpg with a great storyline and many side quests. There is a lot to explore and loot. Many different weapons and also spells are waiting for a worthy fighter.

Story

The main story procures with the four villages in Knightlife. The strongest village, Wintermoor, wants to conquer Goldspring, Maplehold and Belmount. You come along as a weak knight and get to know about the attack. You help the poor people and try to scare away the attackers. You make more and more allies who can teach you new skills and spells. There are many treasures and many secrets waiting for you in the big world. Some allies remain loyal, others do not. Save the world in Knightlife and make a name for yourself as the strongest knight ever!


Features

  • Knightlife offers a varied open world with a lot of loot.
  • Improve your weapons and your bows at the blacksmith's or rather have them covered with a fire spell.
  • Or maybe you prefer to be a mage in general and change your swords with powerful wands. From explosive arrows to simple daggers, there is a lot of variety.
  • The villages have their very own system. If you help the inhabitants, your reputation will increase and you'll be rewarded with legendary equipment or exclusive quests. Besides, the villages evolve and expand their stores and houses.
  • Many small side quests make the world look alive.
  • Be wary of many different enemies, such as wizards, barbarians or even winter moor soldiers. There may even be boss fights waiting for you around some corners.
  • Specialize your character using the character editor and skill trees.

name: PK2022
detailed_description:
Introduction to play [/]
The main type of game is 3D yacht racing game. You need to control the yacht to race with other yachts. The operation is also very simple. You only need to press the left and right keys to control the steering of the yacht and press the space bar to accelerate. The larva map is very tortuous and there are many curves. You need to accelerate at an appropriate position, otherwise you may hit the two sides of the runway and slow down.
Whoever finishes five laps first will win the race!
The game also has an internal purchase system, which can increase the maximum moving speed of the yacht by spending money. You can increase the maximum movement speed by 0.1% for every $0.1 spent. The quantity is customized. Make it easier for you to surpass other yachts.

name: Peep Invasion
detailed_description:
Forge your team from a variety of different creatures, each with their own strengths and abilities, and stop the never-ending invasion of Peeps!
Defend, Attack, and claim victory!

Build Your Defense


Build your defense out of over 20 different units, from little spiders to giant stone monsters each with their own strengths and abilities.

Stop The Invading Peeps


Stop the invading waves of peeps from reaching your leader!

Attack Your Opponents Lane


Hire temporary units to assault your opponents lane

Blessings


Spend the favor accumulated with your leader to request powerful blessings to aid your units - or destroy your enemies.


20+ playable units
40+ Spells and Abilities
Many Peeps

name: MoonFire: A Seeker's Saga
detailed_description:
KICKSTARTER IS LIVE ~ LETS MAKE THIS GAME BETTER ~ https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/539866895/moonfire
*Link to the Free Demo on Kickstarter*


MoonFire: A Seeker’s Saga is a crafted blend of a Visual Novel and an RPG with Open-World mechanics. Set within a boundless fantasy world, you will experience dozens of characters and eccentric lore. Manage a system of six main traits that aid your exploration inspired by the likes of DnD with RNG rolls, character buffs, party stats, and much more.

Discover the stories Tavnorr holds as you embark on a journey across Malenthia.
Uphold your honor or live by your own rules. Manage your stats and choose your dialogue with others. Watch as it shapes your personality and the reactions from those around you.
Careful though, as some decisions may not only hold your fate in peril, but the fate of others as well.


  • Build a roster of delightful companions
  • Level your character to master in diplomacy, hone your thievery or withstand combat
  • Collect items to hoard, sell, or aid in your exploration
  • Choose to become a SunSage or LunarKnight, both permitting great power
  • Freely explore a fantasy world on the brim of darkness and deceit
  • Assist the Seeker in her journey of discovering the truth




- Additional adventures through side quests
- Campsites to explore and rest
- Opportunities to bond with your favorite companions




You are awake now.
I know you can't speak. You will, soon.
The Seeker has saved you for this quest.

You are in Malenthia, a land once whole and strong. The Second Era ended with the death of Queen Kulviete, many years ago. She and her family succumbed, and now the lands of Malenthia begin to crumble under the encroachment of fiends, beings of unknown origin that devour all in their path. Rumors and unrest grow into endless dispute under the spiteful gaze of one called Damaskia.

I know you have no memory of this. It must be this way. As the only human amid Creature-Kind, you must learn as you travel across Malenthia. Yours is the power of gods and demons alike, to use reason to put to rest the all-consuming chaos. Within this puzzle of scattered pieces, everything can be connected, if you can bring your mind and heart to bear.

You have questions. I am sure... But will you find what you seek?

name: Infinadeck Medieval Maze
detailed_description:
This virtual reality maze is a basic experience for the Infinadeck Omnidirectional Treadmill. It takes just under 2 minutes at max speed to get from the start to the end when using the treadmill- how fast can you make it through? Many objects are interactable within the space, and there are a couple of Easter eggs here and there. Designed for first time walkers, there are no jumpscares or things chasing you- the nuances of the experiences are up to you. Will you clear the maze as fast as possible? Or perhaps stroll through at your own pace?

This maze was built using free assets from the Unity Store, including the SteamVR Unity Plugin, so it seemed right that this project be distributed for free as well.

Useful desktop keybinds:
Spacebar: Stop Treadmill
RightShift: Start Treadmill
Keypad0: Start/Stop Treadmill
Keypad9: Boot/Shutdown/Reboot Infinadeck Plugin

LeftShift: Reset Level
Escape: Quit Game

Keypad1: Toggle Deck Ring
Keypad2: Toggle Deck Edge
Keypad3: Toggle Deck Center
Keypad4: Toggle Reference Panel
Keypad5: Toggle In-Engine Deck
Keypad6: Toggle Heading
Keypad7: Toggle Colorblind
Keypad8: Cycle Panel Theme
KeypadPeriod: Import Preferences
KeypadEnter: Reset Preferences

Alpha1: Set Timer to 1 Minute
Alpha2: Set Timer to 2 Minutes
Alpha3: Set Timer to 3 Minutes
Alpha4: Set Timer to 4 Minutes
Alpha5: Set Timer to 5 Minutes
Alpha6: Set Timer to 6 Minutes
Alpha7: Set Timer to 7 Minutes
Alpha8: Set Timer to 8 Minutes
Alpha9: Set Timer to 9 Minutes
Alpha0: Set Timer to 10 Minutes

detailed_description:
The second installment of yota’s Pop Fantasy series!
This is a professionally re-arranged collection of the “BigMonster” and “NPC Face” materials from the default assets, into a pop, comedy, casual like style!

This set has great synergy with the previous "Butler & Face Set", giving you the option to add to your game a comedy, playful taste to create a “Pop Fantasy”!

Enemy: 36 items (18 items + 18 items for SV)

name: RPG Maker MV - Otani Pixel Fantasy Enemy Pack Vol.3
detailed_description:
Looking for an intimidating monster to make an epic battle? Look no further than Otani’s high-quality fantasy pixel art series! Proudly introducing Vol.3!

This is a nice to have pack for creators looking to make an epic-looking world or story!
This Enemy Pack includes 30 different types of pixel art of fantasy enemies, from common to legendary monsters. These would definitely make your world more vivid than ever!

Included materials
＜Graphics＞
This package contains 30 types of pixel art data - 3 small, 4 medium, and 3 large type monsters, including iconic ones like Gargoyle, Devil Lord, Chimera, etc. Each monster type contains
3 types of color and detail variations, totaling up to 30 sets of pixel art! Each set also has two sizes to suit all your battle needs!

＜Reference＞
────────────────────────

────────────────────────

Recommended purchasing this pack in conjunction with other Otani’s packs to maintain a consistent art style and enhance the realism of your game!

name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Desert Map Pack
detailed_description:
FG Desert Map Pack

The Desert Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package allows the creation of desert and arid locations and consists of a solid base of natural elements and backgrounds. 

This pack includes the following items:

  • Background images of many sand, rock, and ground types with varied transitions between each of them
  • Decorations include many rocks and rock formations, desert plants and trees, and more
  • Effects of all ground types for further customizations and smooth integrations
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

name: DIVE
detailed_description:
DIVE is a 3rd person shooter with light puzzles and platforming. You play as a recently activated candidate, exploring an artificial and abandoned world while trying to overcome its trials and enemies. Combat is heavily inspired by Nier and Megaman Legends.

Developer Notes

This has been fairly long solo project (stretching about 3x over the original 6 month estimate), but it ended up being so enjoyable to design, build, and playtest that I honestly had a difficult time stopping. For the project itself, my goal is to take a break from this and use the lessons-learned on bringing other projects to life.


If this project looks or feels like something you'd like to see receive more love and attention, then feel free to ping me on Twitter or some other venue.

Thank you for playing!

Demo Citations

A few resources were used in the demo:

  • 2 Berlinist songs from the Gris OST
  • 1 replica model from Gears of War

  • 1 sound effect Zelda
  • 1 sound effect from Nier

All rights and whatnot belong to their original owners etc.

name: Fantasy Grounds - FG Desert Ruins Map Pack
detailed_description:
FG Desert Ruins Map Pack

The Desert Ruins Map Pack features images and art produced by our in-house artist, Joshua Watmough. They have been organized and optimized for use with Fantasy Grounds Unity and the image tools. This art package allows the creation of desert ruins and temple locations. 

This pack includes the following items:

  • Brush images of stone walls, wood scaffolding and fences
  • Decorations include many ruins elements, rubble and debris, urns, crates, treasure and more
  • Floors of stone elements and stairs.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Joshua Watmough

name: 浮生箓
detailed_description:
近期活动与公告

当前版本为先行版，官方剧本量还比较少。游戏本体内容量稍有不足，当前本体更多偏向于一款剧情编辑器。但我们会持续更新更多的官方剧本，游戏本体内容也会随着更新而拓展，诸如“NPC编辑”“NPC事件”“更多的剧情模式”等。
当前的编辑器已经能够支持大多的剧本设计，但仍有许多不足之处，因此在未来的开发中，编辑器与编辑器生成的内容可能会不断的修改优化。但这可能会带来存档的无法续用，当然我们也会尽可能的避免。
很抱歉在先行版本中可能会有诸多不妥之处，建议慎重考虑后购入。
感谢大家的支持，我们会不留余力的继续完善，争取给大家带来一个可以更好实现剧本想法的编辑器与更加活跃的社区。

特别说明：本游戏支持创意工坊，欢迎大家自由创作自己喜欢的剧本。


加入我们

欢迎关注我们官方媒体
微博 ：@浮生箓
B站：@浮生箓
抖音：@浮生箓
百度贴吧：浮生箓吧

加入官方QQ群：
1群： 767174670


About the Game

为当梦是浮生事?为复浮生是梦中。——白居易《诗喝》

《浮生箓》是一款轻量化可视化，具有选择互动式的小说游戏。我们提供了修仙、武侠等初始剧本给大家体验。当然我们也会不断的继续更新更多的故事剧本，一起体验百态人生。



-互动式轻量化小说体验-
在故事的推进中，每一项选择都有可能触发不同的故事剧情。不同的属性状态，也会可能让故事有不同的结局。紧凑性与随机性不断地相互碰撞融合，每一次都会有不一样的体验。



-创意工坊的支持-
除了我们给大家准备的初始剧本之外，我们还开放了创意工坊，这里每天都会更新大量的奇怪的或者有趣的剧本，并可以很简单的订阅并参与到其他伙伴们提供的各种故事当中。也可以发挥自己的创作才能，创作出各色各类的故事提供给大家评鉴。



-图文并茂的展示-
设计中，我们不仅可以通过文本来表达故事，还可以配上插画亦或是GIF格式的动图，这会让我们想要表达的故事更加生动灵活。



-精简的故事编辑器-
如果已经玩腻了别人的故事，又或者说一直想要撰写出自己心目中的世界。《浮生箓》会是很好的创作平台。我们提供了可视化的故事流编辑。可以让每个人都轻松的绘制出自己心目中的故事线。
故事编辑器支持：自定义属性、自定义词条、自定义行为、自定义事件、事件流-事件包-剧本；丰富的本地图片库、自定义图片/GIF动图导入。据多数使用者分析，当前编辑器基本可以做出大部分人喜欢的剧本。

short_description: 《浮生箓》是一款剧情重开模拟游戏，互动式轻量小说游戏。支持创意工坊自由编辑与上传自己的剧本，融合如修仙、武侠、玄幻等小说题材的背景，可自由选择出生的剧本，体验千变万化的人生，从出生开始让你体验到丰富多变的剧情，多种多样的选择，不同选择带来不同的变化，各种有趣的梗。来吧，开始你的浮生之旅，随着进程生成自己的浮生箓！

name: Shirone: the Dragon Girl Demo
detailed_description:
Imagine waking up in a haunted castle.
"Where am I?"
You ask every creature you see, but none of them know.
The only thing you're sure of is that you need to get out of here.
That's the situation Shirone is in, and she needs your help to escape.

”Shirone: the Dragon Girl" is a 3D adventure game where you help Shirone solve puzzles and riddles to find a way out of a haunted castle.
Escaping the castle is the main objective, and to do that you'll need to make full use of her wings and tail!

Find clues to solve the puzzles that block your escape.
Your imagination and creativity is what will help you find the right passage.


【Key Features】
・Shirone's action
Double jump by using her wings and use her tail to pull levers!
Find the exit in every stage.
　　
・3D puzzle stages
"How can you get from point A to B?" "What can you do to open the way?"
You'll need to observe Shirone's surroundings carefully to figure out the right answer.

・The haunted castle is full of strange monsters.
Shirone isn't the only one that wandered in.
How did they all end up in the castle?
It will all slowly come to light as you make progress through the stages.

・Adventure in style
Every stage has "mystery pieces" scattered about.
Collecting them will unlock hairstyles and clothing you can dress Shirone in.

name: Tower Words
detailed_description:
Tower Words is a minimalist word game which you have to write words that fit the requested categories, before the letters reach the top.

  • Simple mechanics: use mouse or keyboard to play
  • Educational: train your English vocabulary
  • 20 different word categories
  • Different types of obstacles
  • Accumulate points by writing new words
  • Unlock achievements
  • Two game modes: Classic and Endless
  • Minimalist Art

name: Elf World Adventure: Part 1
detailed_description:
NEW GAME!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1891640/AZUR_BEAM/


NEW GAME!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1900930/DANGO/


About the Game

COMING SOON BADGES, CARDS, EMOTIONS !







You are an ordinary gamer who likes to play computer games. One day, returning home from the store, along the way you became a victim of an accident. At the last moment you think that your story is over, but some force has given you a second chance in another world that is completely different from yours. You woke up near the village of elves. As it turned out, the main character is a fan of Elves. You have decided that you will not miss the chance to start life from scratch and have fun to the fullest, and therefore you decide to get them all for yourself. You start your journey from the initial village for beginners of the first level.



In this game you will find:



  • - simple levels

  • - nice music

  • - achievements

  • - lovely pictures

  • - simple gameplay



Here you are the main character who got the opportunity to draw a path to the heart of the most beautiful and lovely elven creatures. Complete 60 simplest levels without straining. To do this, you need to use simple drawing skills. To attract their attention to yourself, draw your way to their heart. "Elf World Adventure: part 1" is a simple gameplay, beautiful music at each level and a lot of achievements that are easy to get.

The game includes many interesting simple levels. There are a lot of romantic musical accompaniments, a lot of interesting scenes that open up as the game progresses. Good luck in having fun with beautiful girls.

Keep in mind that this game has age restrictions - from 18 years and older.This game is uncomfortable to play at work. There are scenes of a sexual nature.

name: 秋恋物语 Autumn Romance
detailed_description:
本作品为异度沸腾动漫社名下沸腾工作社的原创作品。
游戏说明
本游戏是一个拥有完整剧情的视觉小说类型游戏，具有多个剧情分支和多个结局；玩家可通过阅读各章，通过不同的选项推动剧情朝不同方向发展，帮助主人公们走到结局。
在游戏中，玩家可以解锁CG，体验不同结局。
剧情故事长达二十万字，等待着玩家的探索，并且本作拥有原创的BGM和专属OP，希望能有玩家所爱！

简介
我是一个宅。我一直是一个人。我曾试想过想走出自己的房间，走到人群中去。即使是进入大学之后，我依然是一个人。我总是一个人，我知道的。我羡慕那些整日在门外奔波的同学们，羡慕他们嬉笑怒骂。不知从何时起，有了走出那扇门的想法，想要找到与我处于同一个世界的人，想要找到不是只有我一个人的栖身之处。
我只敢将自己的想法在网络中与那素未谋面的陌生人倾诉。
“你是大学生？”与我相识已久网友“枫”问道。
“听说你们学校的动漫社很有名，你为什么不去试一试呢？”
……
大二第一学期将要开学的数天前，各个社团开始招新宣传的那个夏末，怀着大大的不安与小小的期待，我一个人推开了宿舍的的门……

注意：本故事纯属虚构，游戏中出现的世界属于架空世界，与现实世界的任何人物、组合和事件无关，如有雷同，纯属巧合。

short_description: 这是个普通的故事，因为主角是个普通的阿宅，而情节是我们视而不见的日常；这是个值得怀念的故事，那是我们不会再有的时光。当平静到暗淡的大学生活因她们而掀起波澜，生活开始发生了变化。这是个氤氲着青涩懵懂的秋天，被时间和她们推着成长的你，会不会在多年以后感叹那些日子因为她们而灿烂。

name: RUNNER RTX
detailed_description:
RUNNER RTX is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world but with cinematic graphics.

In this game, you have to run through an abandoned enterprise that is about to explode. The building is in a rather deplorable state, which, of course, is rather bad, but it’s much more fun to play this way, because what’s the interest in running around a deserted room where nothing can fall on your head and you won’t be able to twist your leg anywhere?

In order to more strongly feel the role of the protagonist, the game is implemented in high-end graphics, and fire particles are barely distinguishable from a blazing PC in real life!

In general, there is no more time to explain. It's time to run and save your life from the fate of being fried to a crisp!

name: Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission
detailed_description:
Half-Life: Decay, the final, and most often forgotten expansion in the acclaimed Half-Life Anthology, as never seen before! Half-Life Decay: Solo Mission is a fan project that aims to rebuild every chapter from Decay from the ground up, give it a fresh coat of polish, and then retool it all to make for a seamless single-player experience, all without sacrificing any of the quality, gameplay, or presentation of the original expansion.

Planned Features:

  • Remade Decay campaign, retooled for single player
  • A newly implemented subtitle system, complete with English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Chinese, Korean, and Russian localization
  • Full support for both the original, and HD pack models
  • Commentary mode, showcasing the development of Solo Mission
  • And perhaps even more...

name: Vorax
detailed_description:
VORAX is an Open World Survival Horror game set on a Mediterranean island where a mysterious pathogen has infected the local population.
An army battalion is sent to quarantine the population but 48 hours later all communication with the battalion is lost.

You are part of a NATO special intervention team sent to investigate.
What was supposed to be a simple mission quickly turns into a fight for survival as your helicopter crashes, stranding you on the island, alone.

Low on food and equipped with only a small survival kit, you'll need to craft tools, build barricades, fences, and traps as well as find, upgrade, and maintain your shelter to survive as you uncover the dark origins of the virus, and the horrible mutating effects it has on its hosts.

How long can you survive on the island, and how long can you survive the voracious creatures that hunt you?

KEY FEATURES

  • A Large and Detailed Game Environment
  • Urban areas, sewers, caves, and various different areas to explore
  • Unique enemies with different attack patterns
  • A unique and realistic tactical helmet with military HUD
  • Building barricades, fences and traps to fortify the base.
  • Craft tools and weapons
  • hunting and cooking food
  • Treat wounds and other injuries
  • Wide array of both conventional and non conventional weapons
  • A day night cycle and dynamic weather
  • Unique stress and sleep mechanics

name: I don't think I've walked this stretch of road before
detailed_description:
A short narrative adventure game by hexcavator.

Walk the length of your memories on a lonely country highway.

Follow the signal. Return to the place you left behind.

Piece together a truth you can live with.

Gameplay


-Just walk: Traverse a dreamy backroad littered with fragments from your past.
-Point-and-click: Explore vignettes and manipulate objects to gather snippets of prose.
-Thrills without chills: Reconstruct a hopeful story of personal reckoning.
-Low stakes: No combat or failure state. Move at your own pace and let curiosity guide you.
-Compact: < 30 minutes to play through.

Features


-Surreal, minimalistic 3D landscape
-Guitars + brooding analog synth ambience
-Shameless Jeff Nichols/Kelly Reichardt/David Lynch worship
-Lo-fi, low-poly, no-budget psychodrama
-Dual analog or keyboard input

Errata


I don't think I've walked this stretch of road before is a mashup of homespun 3D design, pulsating electronic sounds, and my desire to tell humanizing, hopeful stories about struggling to make sense of pain. It was built haltingly over about a year and a half using some tools I know well & others I barely understand.

I was inspired throughout by the small but resilient community of people using Gamemaker: Studio for 3D development. Like any commercial framework, GM:S has its caveats, but I appreciate its primordial, open-ended toolset, and I hope this game can be a small but interesting contribution to the scene.

More than anything, I hope it weirds you out for a little while, and maybe offers a bit of respite from grimly uncertain times.

Focus and wait for the right moment to release the ball, don't be in a hurry, just have fun playing.



Choose the best angle to throw the ball, every inch of difference can make you miss the next target.



Click and drag in the direction you want to shoot the ball.

name: RPG Town
detailed_description:
Welcome to RPG Town, a lighthearted management sim where you run a small fantasy-game town, converting local businesses to serve rowdy adventurers!

These adventurers are looking for typical RPG stuff - shops to stock up before the next big dungeon, an Inn to rest at or maybe grab a pint... but as time passes, they get impatient... Your grandmother's beautiful earthen-ware vase? They'll smash it. They'll ransack your house for pocket change. They'll drive everybody in town nuts. So what are you gonna do about it?

As Mayor of RPG Town, convert local businesses like florists and pet shops into apothecaries and bladesmiths, hire local layabouts to improve service and run errands, build roads to re-connect the town, unlock new modes and features to improve your odds, or re-purpose local monuments into your own propaganda. Do whatever it takes to survive, but be aware that your choices may come back to haunt you!

New adventurers keep coming, each looking for different goods and services… With only a handful of businesses to convert, can you keep up with their constant demands? You could increase taxes for the locals if you're low on Coin, or perhaps take advantage of special abilities some characters and businesses provide...

But beware, election time is just around the corner, and if the townies aren't happy with the job you’ve done, they're liable to vote you out with a guillotine! You’ll have to make tough choices to survive as a community and as Mayor, but if you're smart about it, you might even get rich in the process!

name: MotorSim 3 Demo
detailed_description:
MotorSim 3 is the logical evolution to a 3D game of MotorSim 2, our successful Android App which scores 4'8 stars of 5.

What You Can Do:

  • Set up a number of values for your car (horsepower, weight, gear rations, drag/CX coefficient an so on).
  • Test the car (straight line only) in 3 different environments.
  • Create races among different cars with distinct configurations.
  • Set the camera in any place you want with respect to any car during the race.
  • Edit car materials and colors.
  • Edit wheels and rims (dimensions, offset, rim design, spokes count, material, color).
  • Edit engine, turbo/supercharger, transmision and gearbox sounds.
  • Modify some car parts.
  • Compare your current car performance with previously recorded ghost.
  • Learn how car acceleration physics work.

Modes:

  • Campaign mode: gain credits and upgrade your car through 270 events.
  • Free mode: set up your cars and create races as you wish (drag races up to 8 cars).


Demo limitations:
- Only 90 of 270 events are playable at campaign mode.
- Cars over 1000hp can't be tested.
- Only 1 car model of 4 can be driven.

name: Far Away From Home
detailed_description:
Far Away From Home is a story-driven tactical RPG. After a mysterious turn of events during a scientific unveiling gone awry, Simon and his allies initially think themselves lost. However, after a hostile encounter with strange creatures, they soon learn that their predicament is much more dire.


Turn-based tactical combat that will challenge you at every step as you battle your way through unique and difficult encounters.



What better way to make new friends than with food? Recruit these strange creatures to your side with tasty snacks. Utilize their unique abilities to turn the tides of battle.



Build a formidable fighting force by customizing your team to your individual playstyle. Each character can be built in a variety of ways for vastly different roles depending on the skills and stats you choose.



Find and craft powerful gear to further augment your team and change how you wage battle against your enemies.



A joint effort from various nations sees the unveiling of the worlds largest hadron collider, spanning across the globe.

Upon the first demonstration, however, strange rifts start to materialize around the Earth, drawing people into them. After getting sucked into one of these anomalies, Simon and his friends find themselves in a familiar yet unknown world.

Seemingly devoid of all other humans, but in their place, strange beasts, Simon and his friends must unravel the mystery surrounding their predicament and set off in search of a way home.

short_description: Far Away From Home is a story-driven tactical RPG. Battle foes in turn-based combat, turn monstrous enemies into friends, customize your party with a variety of builds, and craft powerful gear to enhance your playstyle. Unfold the mystery of your lost party as you try to find a way home.

name: The Flow Experience Demo
detailed_description:
The Focused Experience

The Flow Experience is a game of focus and determination. Move, dash, and guard through enemy attacks to survive. You don't shoot. You don't attack. Just go with your instincts and stay alive.



The Growth Experience

Making mistakes is being human. Don't worry if you're getting beaten. Just trust your feelings, listen to the music. Follow the symbols of ancient civilizations and learn to improve. You will grow with every try.

short_description: The Flow Experience is a classic 2D action game about evading and blocking enemy attacks through rythmic interactions on your path to personal growth. Move, dash, and guard to protect yourself and find your true potential on this zen-like twist on traditional arcade bullet hells.

name: The Brew Barons Demo
detailed_description: A tranquil world becomes ever more corrupt by the day, spoiled by a strong-armed pirate organization that forcefully impose their brewing monopoly over the lands. Armed with your own brewery and seaplane, it's up to you to explore, forage, craft, sell and deliver your handcrafted brews with aid from fellow pilots who've joined your cause to overthrow the corrupt pirate organization and restore peace.

name: Wild Souls Demo
detailed_description:
Demo Version




Plant a tree, watch the forest grow.
Wild Souls is a chill ecosystem sim with no time pressure, inspired by Don't Starve and Zoo Tycoon.
Build your own world like you would a garden, experiment which animals and plant species can live together, manage and balance the populations, write YOUR stories.

You start as a Souls Keeper : a being with the power to gather the souls of recently deceased animals and plants.
Those souls can be offered a new life, in a new body. But which body ? You decide.
Decide which species you're gonna choose to build your own world, plan ahead, improvise, experiment.

As you learn the specific needs of each species, you'll get closer to a perfectly balanced ecosystem : follow the bloodines of the creatures you added, watch their offsprings grow, and witness the stories of their lifes.


Plant a proud willow by a river. It may die, put down by a beaver or the thunder.
Or survive long enough to become the elder of a massive forest, shelter to many forest-dwellers animals...
What will it's story looks like ?


Key features :


  • Collect souls as a currency, spend them wisely to add new creatures and plants.
  • Control any animal : you can now try to survive in the very environment you created !
  • Observe your world evolve, see the livings interacts with each other in a lot of ways
  • Follow the rythm of seasons : Winter can be a difficult time for all, but in the Spring flowers will regrow on their own !
  • Relax : listen to the sounds of nature, the music, and release stress
  • Minimal features due to the demo version

name: WILD WEST
detailed_description:
WILD WEST - is a hardcore 3D shooter with survival elements where you will have to fight various enemies playing as a sheriff James. The main aim of the game is endless struggle between evil and good. You will have to clean enormous locations from criminals, seek gun and ammo, keys which will help to do next levels. At the you are given three different kinds of gun that will help you allthe time. But be careful-your cartridges can end up at any moment and your destiny will be done!
Think of your every step, every move, save cartridges, do the levels. You will enjoy the Wild West atmosphere!

KEY FEATURES:
- Pixel graphics
- Dynamic gameplay
- Wild West atmosphere
- Large levels with lots of enemies
