name: Train Simulator: Union Pacific F3 Loco Add-On
detailed_description:
Featured DLC

https://store.steampowered.com/app/980544


About the Game

In the history of American locomotives, few diesels are more famous nor left a greater legacy than the Electro-Motive F3. Successor to the landmark EMD FT and the first of the fabled “F-units” rated at 1,500 horsepower, the F3 went to work for over 50 U. S. railroads across the breadth of the continent. Between 1945 and 1949, Electro-Motive built more than 1,800 of the classic streamlined diesels and the F3 type would go on to record a long and successful operating career that continues to this day.
And now, for Train Simulator comes a pack that is every bit as extraordinary as the F3 itself! Created by skilled developer DTM, the Union Pacific F3 DLC delivers an all-new and ultra-realistic F-unit and includes the legendary diesel in the liveries of Union Pacific plus eight popular Union Pacific predecessor railroads!
Included in this remarkable DLC are F3s in the liveries of Union Pacific, Southern Pacific, Rio Grande (two liveries), Western Pacific, Missouri Pacific, Katy, Chicago & North Western, Chicago Great Western, and Minneapolis & St. Louis!
The pack includes both the F3A cab unit and accompanying F3B booster, features meticulous authenticity, and offers a range of customizable details.
And still, there’s more! The pack also includes a selection of boxcars in 14 authentic and colorful paint schemes, road-specific cabooses in eight realistic liveries, and also a tank and flat car (with multiple loads). Plus, four career scenarios will put you to work on the Train Simulator Union Pacific Wasatch Grade: Ogden - Evanston Route (route available separately).
For anyone, and everyone, interested in classic first-generation diesel railroading, this pack offers endless opportunities for captivating and enjoyable action on a wide variety of Train Simulator routes. Climb aboard and take the throttle of one of railroading’s most successful and remarkable diesel locomotives!

Included Scenarios


Four career scenarios are included on the Train Simulator Union Pacific Wasatch Grade: Ogden - Evanston Route:

  • 01 - Tanker Train to Ogden
  • 02 - Eastbound Boxcars
  • 03 - First Train of the Year
  • 04 - Goodies to the West

Please Note: Union Pacific Wasatch Grade: Ogden - Evanston Route Add-On is required, as a separate purchase, in order to play the scenarios featured in this add-on.

More scenarios are available on the Steam Workshop online and in-game. Train Simulator’s Steam Workshop scenarios are free and easy to download, adding many more hours of exciting gameplay. With scenarios being added daily, why don’t you check it out now!

Click here for Steam Workshop scenarios.

Key Features


  • Electro-Motive’s legendary F3 1,500-horsepower streamlined diesel locomotive in F3A cab and F3B booster configurations
  • Liveries for Union Pacific, Southern Pacific, Rio Grande (two liveries), Western Pacific, Missouri Pacific, Katy, Chicago & North Western, Chicago Great Western, and Minneapolis & St. Louis
  • All-new F-unit model with highly realistic features and customizable details
  • Boxcars in 14 authentic and colorful paint schemes
  • Road-specific cabooses in eight liveries
  • Tank car and flat car (with multiple loads)
  • Four career scenarios for the Union Pacific Wasatch Grade: Ogden - Evanston Route
  • Quick-Drive compatible
  • Download size: 1.2GB

Please note that the Union Pacific F3 is an extensive and highly detailed pack and you may be required to adjust your in-game settings to get the best possible experience. The use of 64-bit Train Simulator is also recommended.

name: City of Gangsters: Criminal Record
detailed_description:
The times have changed


Take control of your outfit and engage in daring new schemes in City of Gangsters: Criminal Record.

Captain Roles - Got a guy in your crew who’s been in a few dust-ups and knows how to handle a weapon? A gal who has been running booze all over town and can make some solid deals? Well, once you attain the rank of captain, you’ll be able to give them a specialized role that’s particularly suited to their own, unique experiences. And as befits the boss, you’ll be able to see all of your captains and crew laid out before you in a new organization hierarchy. Some of the roles that your captains will be able to take on include:

  • The Enforcer
  • The Intimidator
  • The Jailbird
  • The Lookout
  • The Mouthpiece
  • The Closer
  • The Accountant

Attaining a specialized role requires very specific experience and expertise, which differs from role to role. A captain can only have one role, so choose wisely!

Schemes - As your gang grows through the 20s, you will discover that your captains will come up with ideas for their own personal schemes. These elaborate illicit activities (such as a bank heist or the blackmail of a crooked cop) unfold over a number of stages, containing different options and potential consequences.

Will you be able to leverage a scheme to your long-term advantage? Or will your captain fall prey to their own ambitions, the law, or your rivals?

Philadelphia map - Your family connections in the area will get you a unique starting condition that is sure to be incredibly profitable. The City of Brotherly Love is a perfect location to make a quick buck with its additional resource production. Philadelphia is also a wealthy city with more banks than your average town, making the bank heist scheme extra appealing - and lucrative.

Your Office - As a boss of a certain standing, you will now be able to set up your office, in a secluded country lodge or stylish downtown penthouse, and fill up your new office with spoils of victory and mementos of your escapades.

name: The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots
detailed_description:
You’re Johnny D, a denizen of a whole new kind of future. As Johnny, you’re a hyper-clever, yet affable hero living in a crazy future where holograms, nanotechnology, and the Net have been melded together to become a single-minded, all-encompassing entity. Meet Artificial Intelligence Manufacturing Entity (AIME), the AI that holds this world together. Sadly, if not predictably, AIME has been infected by an unknown random code, and is wreaking widespread havoc across the land. Bring your best problem-solving skills, a sense of humor, and maybe an extra-large can of WD40 because things are getting a little weird around here. The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots is a unique game of nimble puzzle-solving, contraption-building, platforming challenges, wild adventure and creative exploration.



AIME is having what you might call a bad day. But, like a REALLY bad day. And her breakdown is throwing "normal" right out the window. Bizarre stuff is starting to emerge from BuildSpheres all over the place. What appears to be merely a toaster, your fridge, and, say, an electric shaver one minute, could suddenly be mashed together by AIME resulting in the most oddly threatening device you've ever seen. These mashed-together "Anomalbots" come in infinite shapes, sizes, utilities, levels of threat, ideas of a good time, etc. Rest assured that whatever comes out of the BuildSpheres is going to be something totally random, and unexpected. Like we said, things are getting weird around here, and as AIME's issues continue, it’s only going to get worse.



As this odd world continues to spin out of control, Johnny discovers clues related to the origin of the BuildSpheres which reveal a widening mystery. In order to progress and increase your trove of needed items, you'll need to capture vital puzzle pieces that unlock each level. These provide the information and the tools you’ll need to solve the mystery and be victorious in the climactic final battle with AIME and the Anomalbots.
about_the_game:
You’re Johnny D, a denizen of a whole new kind of future. As Johnny, you’re a hyper-clever, yet affable hero living in a crazy future where holograms, nanotechnology, and the Net have been melded together to become a single-minded, all-encompassing entity. Meet Artificial Intelligence Manufacturing Entity (AIME), the AI that holds this world together. Sadly, if not predictably, AIME has been infected by an unknown random code, and is wreaking widespread havoc across the land. Bring your best problem-solving skills, a sense of humor, and maybe an extra-large can of WD40 because things are getting a little weird around here. The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots is a unique game of nimble puzzle-solving, contraption-building, platforming challenges, wild adventure and creative exploration.



AIME is having what you might call a bad day. But, like a REALLY bad day. And her breakdown is throwing "normal" right out the window. Bizarre stuff is starting to emerge from BuildSpheres all over the place. What appears to be merely a toaster, your fridge, and, say, an electric shaver one minute, could suddenly be mashed together by AIME resulting in the most oddly threatening device you've ever seen. These mashed-together "Anomalbots" come in infinite shapes, sizes, utilities, levels of threat, ideas of a good time, etc. Rest assured that whatever comes out of the BuildSpheres is going to be something totally random, and unexpected. Like we said, things are getting weird around here, and as AIME's issues continue, it’s only going to get worse.



As this odd world continues to spin out of control, Johnny discovers clues related to the origin of the BuildSpheres which reveal a widening mystery. In order to progress and increase your trove of needed items, you'll need to capture vital puzzle pieces that unlock each level. These provide the information and the tools you’ll need to solve the mystery and be victorious in the climactic final battle with AIME and the Anomalbots.
short_description: The BuildSphere ~ Rise of the Anomalbots is a cyber-cool and retro-style, sci-fi scavenger hunt and puzzle solving game with platforming and obstacle course like levels. Each progressive level will challenge you to collect assets and craft your next piece of loot in order to progress in the game.

name: Nodes
detailed_description:
Nodes is an upcoming 2D RPG game filled with friends and unforgiving enemies.

You play as an unnamed character with a mysterious creator. You start by waking up in an unfamiliar blank void, wielding no clear purpose, only to be released into a colourless world inhabited by friendly companions violent strangers and many surprises, which you must learn to trust or kill if you want any chance to survive.


Features


-Party Members
Almost everything is better together.
-Bullets
Dodge bullets on a board.
-Simple Ink Visuals
Strange flat characters inhabiting a simple world.
-Battle System
A battle system where you dodge bullets raining down from nearly any where on screen.
-Unique art style
Experience a world lacking colour, but beaming with charm.
-Woah that's a lot of Items
Around 40 different weapons, armour, and items to collect. All with their own unique abilities.

name: Telestians
detailed_description:
Telestians

A quick turn-based dark fantasy strategy game.

Start off with a Hero, build new armies, and defend your castles as you strategically conquer your enemy's castles.

Take control and play as any of the following factions:
Barbarians - Chaos - Dwarves - Elves - Gadiantons - Knights - Orcs - Reptilians - Undead

Heroes

You'll start off each game with one Hero. Grow your reputation, by conquering enemies and castles, defeating monsters, and completing holy quests- all of
which will attract more Heroes to flock to your banner.



Heroes can search ruins, where they'll find treasure troves, powerful allies, or rare magical items. Each Hero can equip a magical weapon, armor and relic. Heroes can also embark on holy quests, where they will be tested to their limit against legendary monsters, and if victorious will receive the most renowned magical items in the game.

Armies

Each faction has its own unique armies, and special units. Armies can have attributes that could turn the tide of battle. Oversized units, flying units, archers, assassins, regeneration and much more for you to bring under your banner, and use to crush your enemies. With over 120 different armies in total, you'll need to decide which armies you conscript and send out to attack specific enemy units.

Terrain Maps

Random maps with various terrain provide a refreshing undiscovered game map with each new game. Hills, favored by the Dwarves, grant defensive bonuses. Elves favor the woods, Reptilians, the jungle. The slow, but relentless, Undead can march through Marshes without any movement penalty. Explore and find the faction that best utilizes the terrain to your advantage.

Victory

The world of Telestia is a homage to early strategy games, with an old-school feel, and winner takes all game. Test your might now as you explore and conquer this new, fun and mythical world!

name: Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet
detailed_description:
Jump into a noir mystery about three beings on their journey to discover the truth about their very existence. Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet is a new adventure from veteran indie developer Missing Sentinel Software. While you're discovering this cyberpunk masterpiece, enjoy a smooth jazz sound track by local artists from the Live Music Capital of the World, Austin, Texas.




Yoko Redux: Dreams of a Blue Planet is driven by a rich, often cryptic, story as you control one of three main characters over the course of seven immersive chapters. The story takes you down the paths of Locke, Jeanne and Primus in a world just waiting to be discovered and cracked open.

As you immerse yourself in this unexpected playground, you will challenge your mind and enjoy a few pop culture references along the way. Interacting with the world via point and click, you will make connections with a cast of questionable contacts to find clues, solve riddles and locate the special items necessary to open your way forward.




Experience a cyberpunk world where human consciousness comes in a hard physical shell. Discover the beauty in a shifting five color palette that gives players a vibe of cool logic and mechanical precision. At least at first...



Interact via stylized menus and clean dialogs. Immerse yourself in this digital world, right down to the menus and settings.



Follow along on a progression through the psychedelic in multiple color palettes. Try to hold on to your sanity through mind bending visuals, cinematic camera angles and logic twisting story and you may discover...who is Yoko?




Solve puzzles by clicking through the world and talking to your fellow inhabitants of Novo Redentor, Brazil. You will need all of your wits to follow the clues and move forward through the story. If you need a brief rest and some time to think, play a game of cards with one of your contacts. No one ever turns down a good game of Narspel Jacks.

name: Secrets For Taking
detailed_description:
Secrets For Taking is a game about, well, taking one's darkest and deepest secret.


In another world, there lies magic: the source of all powers. To grow your powers, you have to take the secrets of another person. Magic allows for one to have magic powers, allowing, almost impossible, feats to be accomplished.

This is where You and Mash come into play. You, the player, are connected to a reality where you are its strongest magic-user. You then control Mash. You and Mash have to get to the other world and achieve the goal of taking everyone's secret on that planet. However, there will be retaliation from the person who cursed You and Mash.

So, can You and Mash take everyone's secret?

Features


  • Journey through a new world with its new, beautiful, and mysterious locations!
  • Enjoy a beautiful story and nice soundtrack!
  • Fight enemies with different abilities and stats, making every fight feel fresh.
  • A creative, fun, bullet-dodging system.
  • Other fantastic gameplay mechanics that make the game fun.
  • Make choices that maybe affect the story?
  • Level and Currency systems.
  • A moderately challenging game, that gets harder as it goes on!
  • And taking a lot of Secrets!

[Warning: This game contains flashing lights, patterns, and images; some people may experience seizures when exposed to such. Please be careful.]

FAQ (Frequently Asked Questions)


  • What's the game about?
    You take secrets. It's in the name. (Seriously. This is one of the most common questions about the game.)
  • How long will the game be?
    The DEMO will be 15-30 minutes long. While the full game will be 2-3 hours long.
  • Wait, what's this game about again?
    YOU TAKE SECRETS. It's that simple.
  • When will the DEMO come out?
    This summer. (Somewhere around August to be specific)
  • On a scale of 1 to 10, how difficult is the game?
    The game isn't really that difficult. It's challenging to make you stay intrigued. Maybe a 6.
  • Okay, but, what's the game about again?
    I'm done with this FAQ.

Wishlist

Go Wishlist Secrets For Taking now! You'll be notified of when the Game is available!

detailed_description:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1737370/Jurassic_Architect/


About the Game






Sneaker Custom Simulator will allow you to sit in your own workshop, which you will be able to develop with new elements, tools and models of shoes along with the completion of subsequent orders.


Each aspect of the game has been designed to best reflect the painting process. In addition to painting, we can also repair damaged shoes, clean them and, after painting, apply the necessary care impregnations.




By completing orders in the story mode, increase your skill level and earn to develop your workshop. Each order has specific requirements that we must meet in order to satisfy our clients.




The design mode will allow you to freely personalize shoes with access to all tools, save designs and export them to formats that are helpful for real customization.



Do you personalize footwear? You are just starting out, or maybe you lack manual skills but would like to design your own shoes? Sneaker Custom Simulator will allow you to sit in your own workshop and create what you've always wanted!

name: Contact
detailed_description:
Contact is a horror point and click adventure game. In a bizarre world where you are trapped in an accident, you must investigate and find the whereabouts of your family. You have to run away from the creatures that attack you and collect items to overcome obstacles.

Synopsis

The main character avoids contact from her father and ends up heading home. However, she has an accident of falling off a cliff and wakes up in a familiar place. Is this hell? Or is it her hometown?

Features

  • Unique scenes that is only possible in point-and-click adventure
  • Bizarre and interesting events
  • A different kind of fun from classic adventures through QTE
  • Unique pixel art style

name: Alien Defense
detailed_description:
At night, Alien breaks into the base.
Place the defenses tower and units properly and defeat all Aliens invading the base

This game is a build-type defense game that collects resources and builds a village.
We need to train soldiers to stop Aliens coming in.
Upgrade can produce stronger units.

Buildings
1. Command Center - When destroyed as the last survival station, the game is over. Basically It takes 20 the number of population
2. Supply Depot - It increases the capacity of the population
3. Barracks - If you can produce the attack unit droid, the special unit will be produced with a 20% chance.
4. Engineering bay - This building is responsible for upgrading the attack and defense of the unit.
5. Factory - It's a building you need to produce goliaths.
6. Nuclear laboratory - You can produce and launch nuclear weapons.
7. Railgun - It's a turret that can attack with a distance of 15
8. Tesla - It's a defense tower that returns damage from enemy attacks.

Special unit
If you block Alien's attack, you'll get a special unit, which is used to make heroes

Hero unit
There are 22 heroes in the top unit and you can use various skills

Super hero
When you reach level 8, you can use a droid to transcend and become stronger

name: Dickdown Duel
detailed_description:
Dickdown Duel is an erotic card game RPG about a card game that got lewd cards modded into it.
Acquire new cards, build decks, challenge cute girls and dominate them in Lewd card based duels.
Strip them down, Equip lewd items on them, and make them squeal with pleasure as you acquire more and more lewd cards.

Features

4 Animated Live2d Girls to seduce and challenge in the Dickdown Duel Arena.
47 cards to collect, including 9 with lewd effects.
Cg photos to receive for various challenges completed - from selfies to cosplay photos to more lewd ones.




The Cast


Nat
Age: 24
Occupation: Artist and Game Maker
The ringleader at the underground arena. Spends most of her days off enjoying raspberry flavoured slushies.
======================


Kate
Age: 24
Occupation: Streamer
Despite her chosen occupation, Kate is very shy. She lives a fairly hermitted life, staying in her room most of the time gaming and chatting with friends online.
Every now and then, Kate can be spotted outside ordering her favourite spicy ramen, She also sneakily watches the other girls in the arena get dicked down, but has yet to enter the ring herself.
======================


Taiga
Age: 21
Occupation: Barman
Outgoing and cheerful, Taiga is the life of the party, she runs the bar in the VIP area under the arena, where Nat lets people she likes stay.
======================


Lucia
Age: 23
Occupation: Bouncer
Lucia is a proud member of the demon race. She's in charge of ejecting anyone who breaks the peace at the arena. The rules are clear: no drugs or other illegal substances are permitted, and you will comply or be met with force!
She tells people the reason she doesn't wear pants is because she cant find any to accomodate her fluffy tail... but Taiga thinks she just doesnt like wearing pants.

name: Ninehouse
detailed_description:
What are the real desires deep down of various beauties? By talking and fighting, you will get to know the weaknesses of some of their personalities, which will help you getting to know the deepest desire inside of your girlfriends and those you're trying to pursue.

You can analyze the six heroines and learn about the innermost needs ofthem that are not known to you in the story dialogue. You may hate or love these six heroines, and in here you can train them, cherish them and understand them.

There are many different kinds of personalities, some are easily to be seen, while others can only be found through understanding.

Put down the pride and prejudice and pick up the sincerity and honesty.
This ia a one-man indie game studio, and hope to always bring you a different game experience.
Making games is to provide services, and I hope to serve you with more games!

Game features.
This Game is a combination of "beautiful girls + item pickup + RPG".
Adopt the traditional pattern of item pick-up in mini-games, but it adds the "skill" that can alter the battle result.
Each heroine has her own unique skills.
The game has some plot options that will affect the ending of the beauties, and each character has two ending settings and several CGs.

name: 素数ガール
detailed_description:
◇◇◇ Story ◇◇◇
"You, you like prime numbers?"
A story began from a place where such a voice was spoken from a mysterious beauty girl after school for a day.
Yes, This is a story of love and adventure about prime numbers.
I will definitely remember the joy of meeting new prime numbers.

◇◇◇ Feature ◇◇◇

name: Amnesia - Walkthrough
detailed_description:
[LOCATE YOUR DLC ONCE DOWNLOADED]

Walkthrough added to the game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Amnesia\Walkthrough

If this is not valid, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for "Amnesia" and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

With this guide, you can get help with:
  • Finding every hidden images
  • Unlocking every achievement
  • Unlocking every HOT scenes
  • Finding out how your choices will affect different scenes in the game

name: Project Court 2050
detailed_description:
“Project Court 2050” is a game that combines the Gameplay as "Typing of the Dead", Fun Element as "Rhythm Doctor", Moral Decision as "Papers, Please", and exciting story arc as "Phoenix Wright".

You are a cyberpunk-style court clerk
No matter what happened in the trial, it is your job and duty to type everything down precisely.
Sounds easy? Try to type everything down while the judge, the plaintiff, and the defendant are speaking at the same time.
Plus, your cyborg body could be cyber attacked by other factions that cause your visual device be glitched and unable to see/hear everything clearly.
But no worry, you could also upgrade your chips and gain different algorithms/skills to help you overcome the potential difficulties.

Your decision could change the whole plot of the game!
As you dive into the game, you will realize that you have the ability to affect the trial. And that is why you get involved into the conflict between 3 factions.
You will be threatened or allured by evil corporation to make the false statement, but received tons of credit that keep you alive. Or you could stand with the justice and risk yourself or your friends safety.
There will be 21 levels and 8 different endings in the game, so make your decision wisely.

Explore the cyberpunk style of Taiwan
Between the trial, you could wandering around 3 major cities, visit different places, and meet cool characters to find out the true story behind the cases your are working on. Pay attention to what people are talking about, they might leak important evidence that could change the outcome of the trial.

Level Editor
Want to make your own trial and share with other players? Use our user-friendly level editor and let your creativity go free!
You can use your own image, text, music, dubbing to create very unique level. Lecture, quarrel with your family, meme video, you name it!

Features:
Typing/Rhythm/Reaction gameplay
Cyberpunk Art Style
5 Chapters, 21 Levels, 8 Endings
20+ Visual Interruptions
5 Skills
Level Editor
Full Voice Acting

"Project Court is developing enUS version, please check our website for zhTW version of the game."

In teams heb je hetzelfde principe maar dan in een team van 2 of 4 spelers, hierbij komt er ook een nieuw aspect, de jail, deze is om je teammates terug in het spel te brengen.

name: The Adventures of Mr. Hat
detailed_description:
• "The Adventures of Mr. Hat" is an interesting side-scrolling puzzle game with a minimalist design and a wealth of entertaining levels. This game is easy to start and each level has a different way to pass. These levels will blow your mind and develop your imagination!

  • Players need to control “Mr. Hat” to pass levels, and you can enter the next level after completing the corresponding puzzle of each level. New levels will be continuously updated, welcome to keep challenging.

  • If you encounter issues or have any suggestions, please send screenshots with the detailed descriptions of the issue to our Twitter (@AdventuresHat).

Game Features

  • Interesting Level Design


  • Incredible Way to Pass


  • Combination of puzzle-solving and side-scrolling

name: The Dark Defender
detailed_description:
GAME

The Dark Defender is an indie story-driven, 2D adventure game where you play as a character who has been deserted, with no recollection of your past. With the goal of figuring out who you are, you make your way through a world with friends to assist you on your journey, as well as enemies attempting to burden your adventure. On your path, you meet with various people, some wanting to help, some stopping you and some trying to make a quick buck off your ignorance. It is up to you to forge your path, to forge your confidence, risk-taking, determination and most of all, perseverance.

GAMEPLAY

  • Smooth Movement
  • Various Attack Animations
  • Classic Side-Scrolling Game
  • Buttery Smooth Camera Movement
  • Player Can Switch From Regular Mode To Dark Mode
  • Many Potions Available: Speed Increase, Health Increase, Invisibility, Burn Resistance
  • Bartering System Between Player And AI
  • Tuned Player Movements. Run, Attack, Dash (Regular Mode), Phase (Dark Mode), Jump, More To Be Added!
  • Excellent Music
  • Adaptive Music Based On The Environment / Circumstance
  • Many Enemy Bosses To Battle

UPDATES

While there are scheduled updates planned after the full launch of The Dark Defender, we are certainly always open to community-driven ideas regarding the path the game will take. If you would like to voice your idea, there is a discussion that everyone is free to comment on.

COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION

As already mentioned, everyone will be able to discuss any features they may want implemented into the game. In addition, community art is heavily appreciated and much of it will be showcased in-game and on the store page.

It is up to you to forge your path, to forge your confidence, risk-taking, determination and most of all, perseverance.

GAMEPLAY

  • Smooth Movement
  • Various Attack Animations
  • Classic Side-Scrolling Game
  • Buttery Smooth Camera Movement
  • Player Can Switch From Regular Mode To Dark Mode
  • Many Potions Available: Speed Increase, Health Increase, Invisibility, Burn Resistance
  • Bartering System Between Player And AI
  • Tuned Player Movements. Run, Attack, Dash (Regular Mode), Phase (Dark Mode), Jump, More To Be Added!
  • Excellent Music
  • Adaptive Music Based On The Environment / Circumstance
  • Many Enemy Bosses To Battle

UPDATES

While there are scheduled updates planned after the full launch of The Dark Defender, we are certainly always open to community-driven ideas regarding the path the game will take. If you would like to voice your idea, there is a discussion that everyone is free to comment on.

COMMUNITY PARTICIPATION

As already mentioned, everyone will be able to discuss any features they may want implemented into the game. In addition, community art is heavily appreciated and much of it will be showcased in-game and on the store page.
short_description: The Dark Defender is a story driven adventure game where you play as a character who has been deserted, with no recollection of your past. With determination you make your way through a world with many friends to assist you on your journey, as well as enemies burdening your adventure.

name: Coins Collector Simulator
detailed_description:
Welcome in the racing simulator game: Coins Collector Simulator! The game takes place in the city "Collectorus" where you will have complete freedom. Taxi driver or policeman, it doesn't matter here, you just have to collect all the coins!

Remember that your cars are powered by electricity, so they can be discharged fairly quickly if you don't power them.

Game Features:
- A big open-world style city
- 7 vehicles to choose from
- Collectable energy & coins
- Speedometer & battery
- 4 camera modes

name: American Theft 80s: Prologue
detailed_description:
More games:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1239320/Animal_Shelter/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/704850/Thief_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1332720/Thief_Simulator_2/


About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1321450/American_Theft_80s/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1736450/Colonize_Prologue/

Check out some of Jack's first jobs in this prologue before playing the full game.
From the creators of Thief Simulator.
Every house can be robbed. Just get the right tools and wait for the right time!
Meet interesting characters doing shady jobs.

KEY FEATURES IN THE PROLOGUE:
- explore the first small town from the American Theft 80s
- steal from houses, trailers or gas stations
- finish the first heist
- use the available tools: hammer and crowbar, to break in
- finish shady jobs for shady characters
- disguise yourself as an electrician to fool tenants




If you see a house, shop or a gas station, you can get inside, but learn about the tenants first. You don't want to get caught.




Remember VHS, cassette players, and CRT TVs? No? Well, now you can get to know them! The tenants will surely share them with you, albeit not knowingly.




Earn cash and reputation in the underground world filled with corruption and crime.




Sometimes the only thing you can do is get in the car and drive as fast as possible. But be careful! The cops are not playing around and will chase after you.
Make sure to bribe the police to avoid being wanted.

name: Light of Life
detailed_description:
Light of Life is a challenging precision platformer about an elf named Elanor who possesses incredible power! Using a bow and arrow with the mission: to recover all life fragments stolen by the goblins.

Light of Life takes place in a cute and deadly fantasy world where many dangers will try to stop you as you fight to recover all the fragments. Run and throw yourself towards the light and become the heroine of the elves.



MAIN FEATURES

  • 100 levels - 100 amazing handmade levels full of deadly traps!
  • Controls - Precise controls make it fun to move through the different stages of the game!
  • Combat - Face 5 great bosses in an epic fight with your bow and arrow!
  • Cute and Colorful - Handmade arts. Colorful, cute and nostalgic visuals await you!
  • An A+ Challenge - Collect crystals to unlock fantastic outfits for Elanor!
  • Great to Complete - Completionist players will love to pursue the game's various achievements!

The controls are easy to learn but hard to master. You'll learn from your mistakes and be reborn very fast, getting back into action almost immediately!

name: JETMAN Demo
detailed_description:
A jump action game that you can play with one button!

Feel free to play and clear comfortably! We don't spend much time playing games, but we want to be cool! " JETMAN " can respond to such feelings.

Jump and defeat your enemies!

The height of the jump changes depending on the length of the button hold. Let's make the best jump attack according to the position of the enemy.

There are more than 50 types of enemies!

Many enemies with unique looks and movements will appear. Let's identify the characteristics and capture them efficiently.

Accumulate JP (= junk points) to strengthen your character!

You can use the points earned in battle to strengthen your character. Whether to strengthen the attack or the defense. It's up to you to prioritize which one to strengthen.

Characters and stories that build the world.

A semi-android JET created by Dr. ARK to thwart the ambitions of the evil organization VIOLETS. A story that revolves around him will liven up the gameplay.

Fun after clearing the game.

A dedicated mode that you can play after clearing the main story. Please play " JETMAN " thoroughly!

name: PerformVR
detailed_description:
You supply the music, PerformVR supplies the fun! You don't need to wait for someone to design a dance or karaoke map for your favorite songs, PerformVR does it for you in a matter of seconds! This isn't your typical dance generation either...



Most VR rhythm games only detect a song's tempo, then match some predefined patterns to it. PerformVR works differently, understanding the context of a song, when measures start, segments & more using university-developed algorithms. PerformVR will use all this information to make a custom dance and set of visuals for 4 different difficulty settings you desire. Easy options are provided in-game to correct dancing mistakes if the analysis is a bit off, which happens infrequently. Read more about it here!



A dancing robotic audience will react to how well you are doing. You will be scored against 100% perfection, so you know how well you are really doing (instead of obscure points) -- don't worry, getting 70% or better is really good and you will be graded from F to AAA+! kurohuku shows how it is done:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Uv9DXAOGWTo
PerformVR supports karaoke with any song you have & will extract vocal timing and pitches automatically. This works for some songs better than others, and will occasionally pick up notes that are not vocals.

PerformVR can automatically download imagery related to the song you are playing & gather lyrics too. However, this features require some configuration which you can read more about in the community forum.

PerformVR does not provide any music. It will default to looking in your music folder. Analysis can take 15-30 seconds, but only needs to be done once per song. It is compatible with all popular audio file formats (MP3, OGG, AAC etc.). Trailer music: NEFFEX - Grateful. Uses VAMP Plugins from Queen Mary, University of London (M. Mauch and S. Dixon) & more...

short_description: Want better custom song support in a VR dancing game? Want the option to sing along too? PerformVR does it all using deep musical analysis tools developed by university researchers -- providing you visuals, karaoke & dances that do more than just go along with the beat. Perform in PerformVR!

name: Movie Night
detailed_description:
Ever wanted to just chill and watch videos with your friends at the same time without the need of screensharing?

Introducing Movie Night a casual online multiplayer game allowing players to create their own virtual private cinema. Movie Night is and will always be free to play with absolutely NO micotransactions, paid DLC, or subscriptions. Create a room with up to 12 other players with full control over what is played on your cinema screen with just a youtube URL.

Once a player creates their own private cinema they will become the room master giving control to request any youtube video. As players join the cinema they will immediately sync up to the timestamp of the room master even if the video is skipped ahead. If the room master leaves another player will become the master giving them control (passing the remote).

name: V1ral
detailed_description:
V1ral is a classic fast-paced retro FPS that combines the looks and feel of an old school shooter like Quake, Doom, Hexen with modern game mechanics from games like Titanfall, Ghostrunner for an unparalleled gaming experience.

The game is set in a huge biological/mechanical planet sized supercomputer called Pioneer. Pioneer, though currently inactive, is presumed to be operated by a single operating system called „The Deep Blue“. At the time of setting Pioneer is being infested by a biological/digital virus type being, going by the name of „Mother“. Mother is a malignant, manipulative and self-serving entity that is harvesting the planet for its precious data fragments.

Various types of data fragments are scattered throughout the game and sometimes are dropped by the killed enemies (they act as health, weapon, ammo or special type pickups). With the help of countless numbers of her minions, Mother aims to take over the whole planet. Only C3v1n, a defective cleaning unit that was supposed to get decommissioned will start ruining Mother’s plans to harvest the data fragments.

  • Use various movement abilities to avoid enemies hoarding up on you.
  • Different types of enemies will require different types of weapons and solutions to beat.
  • Solving puzzles to advance will be a huge part of the game.
  • 8 level campaign, with each level introducing new enemies, boss fights and puzzles to solve.
  • Gore, blood, destructible enemy body parts. Everything a great shooter game needs will be in V1ral.

short_description: V1ral is a skill-based, fast-paced retro FPS involving gore, blood and carnage. Moving fast, shooting sharp and keeping a leveled head will be the only way to push through the hordes of enemies, otherwise expect to be devoured by them.

name: Crazi Lift
detailed_description:
Help the young and talented warehouseman to take the manager's license.
Crazi Lift is a simulator / arcade with a forklift that will drive you crazy in this small provincial warehouse.
You only have 30 days (of the game) to be able to get 1 Million dollars to buy the license Manager !!
An exciting adventure against time in which you will have to make money to buy mods and expansions, fight against mice and compete on the track full of pitfalls to collect money.
But I'm sure, this is a piece of cake for you ...
(Optimized gaming experience with Xbox controller).

Game overview:

- You have just over 6 minutes to store and load as many pallets as possible.
- Buy extra warehouses for more space.
- Modify your forklift to be faster, raise heavy pallets and more!
- Answer countless calls.
- Buy dangerous licenses to earn more money.
- Find the "secret objects" to unlock more tuning for your forklift.

Game hardware:

The game works with both keyboard and mouse and with XBOX controllers.
The use of the controller is recommended.



Buy licenses to make more money and progress in the game.



Unlock secret items to make your life easier !!

name: Hazmat Magic
detailed_description:
A young woman sees her lost brother in her dreams. His calls for help lead her to a mysterious and magical factory.

HAZMAT MAGIC is a cute-2d-pixelart-puzzle-platformer about mixing hazardous materials as a bumbling new employee at a magical chemical factory!

- Mix colorful chemicals to unlock powers like super jumps and grapple beams!
- Use your knowledge of magical chemistry to solve whacky puzzles!
- Uncover the mysteries of Hazmat Magic Inc.

"Hazmat Magic Inc., Your value-added source for non-kinetic solids, super-jump compounds, and anti-gravity solutions, ideal for magic manufacturing and general wizardry."

detailed_description:
Trying to romance your love interest but falling short on your choice selections?
Interested in reading some choice-related dev commentary?

The Official Guide for the Synthetic Lover BL visual novel may be for you!

- Dev commentary on each

Viewing instructions:

2. Under the "Local Files" tab, select “Browse...”
3. Open the "Synthetic Lover Official Choice Guide" sub-folder for the official PDF guide.

  • Challenge your friends through codes or even live multiplayer

name: Crossroads: On a Just Path Collector's Edition
detailed_description:
Elephant Games returns with a brand-new title with a twist that’s sure to raise eyebrows with Crossroads: On a Just Path!

WARNING: This horror game features moments of psychological terror that some may find distressing. It is not for the faint of heart.

Lost? Confused? Unsure of what comes next? Then keep an eye open for Crossroads, the mysterious bar that only appears to those that need guidance. Step into the shoes of Alex Staton, a social worker that’s made some poor choices and is struggling to find direction. Step up to the bar and let Mistress Eve guide you through three separate tales, each designed to teach lessons that will hopefully set Alex on the right path by the end. But be careful because the choices you make in this game affect the story and characters around you! Luckily, you can always revisit past stories to see how things could have gone differently. It’s all a part of Mistress Eve’s plan! See for yourself in this eerie but inspiring Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

This is a special Collector’s Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes:

• Find hidden comic book panels to unlock bonus content!
• Join Eve as she searches her comic panels for Kai, and then outwits him to take back her Master Quill.
• Collect all the morphing Crossroad symbols to unlock extra puzzles in the Secret Room!
• Enjoy wallpapers, concept art, and music from the game! Save them for later!
• Need more guidance? Check out the integrated strategy guide!

This is a Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game, meaning a specific genre of story-driven, point & click adventures. Throughout the game, players are tasked to find a list of objects hidden within a particular scene, and to occasionally complete various mini-games/puzzles.

name: Fighting Heart
detailed_description:
FIGHTING HEART is a 3D 1v1 fighting game, bringing the speed and precision of classic fighters into the third dimension.

LIBERATING MOVEMENT

Move freely in 8 directions. Jump, duck, dash and dodge your way to victory.

COLORFUL CHARACTERS

Play as larger-than-life fighters, using less than realistic special moves and techniques.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR BATTLES

Mutators let you shake up your gameplay. Add instant kill divekicks, air-dashes, dwarfism, and more.

MASTER CHALLENGING TECHNIQUES

Mechanics such as Evasion Cancel let you spend meter to escape or extend combos with good timing, while 1-frame links and juggling open the door to devastating damage.

name: Bugged
detailed_description:
Show your bug smashing skills in this work-from-home action puzzle game. Break the bug blocks and beat the performance record with precision clicking before time runs out. Oh no! Don’t let the REAL bugs distract you as they crawl around your quarantined apartment… Crush them too!
Ever since the Age of Covid began, it forced the world of work to evolve. Now, companies require their employees to work-from-home having replaced all physical interaction with specialized virtual environments. Your day consists of wake up, work, and then sleep without ever going outside. You work as a software engineer but all you’ve been doing is finding and destroying code bugs. Is this all your good for? And how long can you last before you're mind snaps?

Features

  • Save your job and smash all those distracting bugs! Where are they coming from? Hunt them down and crush them. It won’t be easy as they move fast and love to crawl under the desk, behind furniture and even on walls!

  • Prove your ability to find and eradicate buggy code in the Work Game. Play the Work Game in a special gamified environment where you and 3 others catch buggy code blocks hiding among sequences of good code blocks. You must pay attention though and select the correct block. Too many mistakes will hurt your performance score!

  • Compete with your colleagues and beat their performance. But they work so hard, like machines. How can you keep up? Doesn’t it seem fishy…

  • Immerse yourself in a believable world that feels just like reality. Based on a real work-from-home scenario, experience the joys of living and working in a small crappy apartment during the Age of Covid.

name: BRDSKT Demo
detailed_description:
BREADSKATE (also known as BRDSKT) is a game about skating... On bread!

  • Drive around as a breadskate
  • Do tricks
  • Collect donuts!
Demo also contains Level editor! If you don't like the example map included, you can try to edit it yourself or make a completely new one.
Breadskate can parkour, do a little bit of wallride and charged jumps to reach high spots, so make a use of it on your own map!

Demo also contains Level editor! If you don't like the example map included, you can try to edit it yourself or make a completely new one.
Breadskate can parkour, do a little bit of wallride and charged jumps to reach high spots, so make a use of it on your own map!
short_description: BREADSKATE is a skateboarding game, but with bread! In this game, you're focused on a skateboard itself. You don't play as a skater, you play as a skateboard! Demo gives you an opportunity to build your own skatepark, level editor is included!
fullgame.name: BREADSKATE

name: Magnus Imago  comics & animations
detailed_description:
There are three short comics to complete Magnus's world and atmosphere:
- Hakeldama
- Green guy
- Journey

It also includes better quality animations from the game.

After installing the DLC, the comics and animations will be in the folder "Magnus Imago DLC" under the root folder where Magnus Imago is installed.
For example, on Windows 10, this folder would typically be "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Magnus Imago".

If you are unsure where Magnus Imago is installed, navigate to Magnus Imago in the Steam library, right click and select "Properties...". Switch to the "Local files" tab in the window that pops up and press the "Browse local files..." button to open the folder

name: Pirates on Target
detailed_description:
Move the blocks.


Change the trajectory.


Discover new ways.


Rotate.


And more...

Move the blocks strategically, your objective is to change the trajectory of the cannonballs until they reach the pirate ship. Simple yet challenging.

  • Simple Controls
  • Dozens of levels
  • Original levels
  • Gradual increase in difficulty
  • Variety of obstacles and blocks

name: Gettysburg: Fields of Valor
detailed_description:
Gettysburg: Fields of Valor (c) is a turn-based two-player historical war game that is played on a hex grid using a multiple phase movement and combat system, with many features that make it fast to play and easy to enjoy:
- American Civil War battle of Gettysburg simulation
- Turn-based, streamlined multi-phase movement and combat
- 50 x 35 topographical hex map of the entire battlefield
- All brigades, artillery batteries, and commanders modeled
- Brigades occupy multiple hexes according to size
- Multi-counter brigades move and fight as cohesive units
- Brigade counter values change with combat results
- Reinforcements and replacements automatically scheduled
- Enemy range of influence automatically calculated
- Unit movement range display and movement undo capability
- Available artillery and targets automatically calculated
- Automatic retreat and advance after successful assault
- Save and reload games from your game library
- Automatic game snapshots for replay and alternate scenarios
- Progress, casualty and objectives report continually updated
- Single-computer (2-player) and play-by-email modes
- Available for Windows and MacOS
- Full details in the Game Manual

short_description: An advanced historical war game that simulates the pivotal three-day battle at Gettysburg during the American Civil War. The game models every brigade, battery, and leader who participated in the largest battle ever fought on the North American continent.

name: No Humanity 2 - Swing'Em Up
detailed_description:
No Humanity 2 is a swing'em up bullet hell game, where everything in the universe trying to kill you, you have nothing but a spacey umbilical cord that can grab, swing, and throw. If a weapon is too heavy, no worry, call your friends and use your umbilical cords together! Enemies too tough? Attach lasers, miniguns, grenades, cats, etc to your big sword, so that you can shoot them while you cut them!

SWING, THROW, RETRIEVE


Pick up a chainsaw, slice through your enemies' left leg, then pick up its left leg throw it towards their mouth!

CRAFTING


Combining lasers, guns, gems and swords into one to unleash massive power!

STORY

In a not far distant future, global warming, Earth too hot, it exploded, like BOOM BOOM. Orange Corporation sent out a ship of interns to find a new habitable planet for humanity while the rest of the humanity Netflix and chill on debris. You as one of many interns, can you save humanity from extinction?

No Humanity 2

It's a sequel to "No Humanity - the Hardest Game", a free-to-play bullet-hell game that got over 10 million downloads. created by the same crazy minds. Expanding the No Humanity Universe, deepen the lore.

As a space intern, your role includes serving coffees, printing paper, and saving the world.

name: Mini Putt Camelot
detailed_description:
Hear Ye!


King Arthur enlists noble putters for his most righteous quest yet: Playing ye olde mini golf! With unlocks aplenty, this is family fun for ye little urchins.

Features Include:

28 Arthurian characters of lore
17 Putters
3 Courses with 54 holes of mini putt madness
20 Balls to choose from
Steam achievements
Night mode for additional ambience

Let’s Get Ready to Dance... With Swords!

Night mode for additional ambience

Let’s Get Ready to Dance... With Swords!
short_description: Hear ye! King Arthur enlists noble mini putt players for his most righteous quest yet: Paying Arctic Arcade money! With 54 holes and unlocks aplenty, this is family fun for ye little urchins. Let’s get ready to dance... with swords!

name: Accelebration
detailed_description:
Finally a video game adaption about Tag!!
Play 1v1 Tag battles against a friend!

Be the tagger or the runner. Chase or Run away in 30 second high energy rounds.

Catch the other player, or don't get caught the entire round to earn a point. First to 3 points wins!!!!

Play as 4 cute stick figures with unique abilities all using exclusively only 2 buttons and a joystick!!

Run around on 4 cute stages with a strange amount of cute plushies

Including lots of fun high-energy original songs!

There is even an option to increase the game's speed!! Is this balanced? NOT IN THE SLIGHTEST !! Wahooooooooooooooooooooooooooo

name: Salvation: Shadows Of The Faceless
detailed_description:
The further you go, the scarier your surroundings become

Story


Ever since Michael lost his wife and daughter in a tragic car accident, his life's turned into a nightmare. Tormented by guilt for their death, Michael suffers from depression and insomnia. Terrifying visions of creatures with long arms silently standing in shadows are following him. A phone call from mysterious Dr. Thaler claiming to help Michael changes everything. Michael discovers the horrifying truth and the way to turn things around...

Features


Candle flame can save your life. Collect candles appearing on your way. It will be your only weapon against the Faceless.

-
When enemies come, keep your speed balanced. Don't run too fast. Otherwise, candle flame will go down, and you'll lose your only weapon. Don't walk too slow, or the Faceless will catch you up. Keep away from turning your back on them.

-
While a candle's burning, its flame's dying. Use it only when the worst comes.



Soul pieces store Michael's memories. Find the pieces and revive your memories. When the time comes, these can help to make the right choice.



Look for notes. You may find a bunch of tips inside them on how to survive in this world.

About gameplay

  • The game will take around six hours.
  • The game features four endings available. Pay close attention to details, learn about traits and relationships of characters, and unlock the best possible ending. You will enjoy all this during the gameplay.

name: 抵抗魅魔—被魔纹侵蚀的女骑士的末路
detailed_description:
游戏简介

玩家将在异世界扮演一名身为城主的美少女骑士，招募各具特色的英雄：

外强内软的女战士—
成熟冷艳的精灵大法师—
只钟情于你的兽娘忍者—
一起抵抗魔族的进攻。
可魅魔阴险狡诈，在她的蛊惑之下，谁将与你走到最后？你们的结局又将会如何？

故事简介

艾琳—

横空出世的圣骑士。
在人们最绝望的时候率领着联盟军击退了魔族的侵犯。
有着绝不退缩的勇气与信念。
直到一个新的魔族首领——克莱儿突然出现： “我要拿回这座原本属于我的乐园！”
当腹部那个古怪图案缓缓浮现的时候， 令人绝望的攻城倒计时正式开始。
身为城主，是坚守信念奋力抵抗，还是选择在欲望中沉沦？
在魔族愈来愈猛烈的攻势下。
是出卖肉体贴补微薄的财政，还是坚守底线，克制自己的欲望？
面对意外失足的英雄，是接受魅魔的“好意”，还是反抗到底？
前方是希望的曙光，还是骑士的末路？
风雨飘摇的城池中，你的抉择引导着艾琳的方向——

游戏看点

这是一款美少女+自走棋+galgame结合的游戏。
玩家需要招募伙伴，提升战力，排兵布阵，最终击败魅魔！
拥有独特的城池经济系统和轻度rouglike元素。
游戏中有些选项会影响伙伴的去留，甚至与伙伴之间发生出乎意料的故事。
多达30张以上的精美CG，15w字以上的文本内容。
由专业的音乐团队制作的精美背景音乐
栩栩如生的角色立绘。

人物简介

艾琳：

安诺：

莫拉丽娜：

阿克斯：

name: Kilroy Was Here
detailed_description:
Stuck stranded alone in another dimension your only goal is to get back to your family, your life. Explore the C.U.B.E to find any information about where you actually are and how to get back, just remember to not go insane trying!

Kilroy Was Here is an Interactive Fiction game where as the player you must traverse the 7 environments in search for their unqiue interaction points to try to gain a better understanding of the place you've ended up in and to try and find a way home.

The More You Look The More You See.

Features

  • Unique Scenery: 7 Completely unique environments for you to explore.
  • Simple Controls: Get straight into the game with basic and common controls.
  • Steam Achievements: Show off to all your friends what you did in-game.

name: Vortex
detailed_description:
Game Updates

Our Kickstater for final dev costs is now live here check it out and consider supporting us if this project interests you
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/vortex-/vortex-2?ref=discovery&term=vortex


About the Game

Vortex is a 3D open level star fighter pilot game in which the player controls StarCraft that can also perform multiple maneuvers in a All-Range Mode style flight simulated cosmic world. Throughout the game, the player can fly or drive through power-ups to collect them akin to classic RPG Space fighters like Star Fox 64. However this game also contains an RPG element as one collects loot from missions you can upgrade an outfit your fighter with new weapons' shields and engines as well as boost the cores systems of your ship such as body and shields.

In the heart of the Centraus V Galaxy a war has broken out throwing the surrounding sectors into chaos for over 1000 years the Aldari Collective has been seizing power in the region now they have all but secured their own galactic empire at this point all the Great houses have fallen save one. The Dovan Initiative Guardians of Hose Elias for centuries are now all the remain their central house was annihilated by the Aldari in a surprise attack now they Fight with all they have to drive these invaders from the homes of all. But they can't do it alone mercenary’s join the call from all sector's.

In Vortex you take on the role of a star pilot mercenary who has been swayed by the cause of Dovan Initiative.

These mercenary's are sent to the academy given ships, weapons and training to become the fighting vanguard of the Dovan Army. You travel now to join them at Sigmus Prime Last Bastion of the Dovan Territory for death or glory now only your skills as a pilot can save you. The docking bay opens and you begin your journey into a new world of war.


Our team has been working to put Vortex together for over 2 and a half years and are very happy with the final result but don't take our word for it try our free demo and see all that Vortex has to offer for yourself. Our demo showcases a few of the first Main Story missions and full access to StarCraft ship and weapon upgrades to give you a central idea of both gameplay and progression in Vortex.

name: Who Shuffled My Shapes?
detailed_description:
Who Shuffled My Shapes?

Your shapes have been shuffled and it’s up to you to fix them! Get your puzzles back in order by twisting, turning, and spinning until all faces are flat and the same colour.
Sounds simple but it’s not. With some of the simpler puzzles offering over 43 quintillion possible configurations (that’s 43,000,000,000,000,000,000), finding the single correct one will be a challenge!

Shuffle the cube again once you're done and try a new combination you need to crack!
Take your time and relax, or put yourself up against the clock to see how fast you can be!

20 Unique Puzzles!

A staggering 20 different puzzles for you to play with. With puzzle shapes ranging from classic cubes to pyramids, dodecahedrons, and even off-axis shapes; there is something exciting for uninitiated and expert puzzlers alike!

name: Whispers in the West
detailed_description:
COMING SOON TO KICKSTARTER!


About the Game

Multiplayer Murder Mystery Game

Whispers in the West is a game set in the far reaches of the Wild West frontier, a perilous dust bowl of cowboys, gunslingers and lawless criminals up to no good. This creates the perfect environment for a whodunit mystery! A crime has occurred in the sleepy town of Brimstone and it’s down to you and three of your friends to deduce who is the perpetrator from among the residents. Interrogate the suspects and navigate this sun soaked town to uncover the truth.

Role-Play Four Unique Playable Characters

The four playable characters each offering a unique skill, which leads to different interactions with the town's residents. Each player's discoveries will be crucial to uncovering the truth. Over the course of a number of in-game days, you and your friends need to collaborate, look for clues and finally piece the puzzle together.

Online Co-op

You and your friends will take on the roles of the Sheriff, the Deputy, the Cowboy and the Outlaw. You must work collaboratively and debate amongst yourselves to deduce the true perpetrator from among the townsfolk. Ask the residents questions or search locations for clues, the choice is yours. But remember, the only way to solve the mystery is to work as a team, only when you piece the information, clues and motives together will you be able to solve the mystery.


Perhaps you’ll be strategic and send your party’s Cowboy to main street to interrogate a notorious cattle rustler, whilst a team member playing as the Outlaw follows a lead on a locked door the Priest seems intent on keeping under wraps…However you allocate tasks, you’ll need to share your findings with your gang of investigators to come to the right conclusion!

Communication is key - Whispers in the West is best played with the company of an online-chatting software, like Discord, Zoom, Google Meet, or WhatsApp.

The Playable Characters

With four unique characters to choose from, you will be equipped with a skill to aid in your investigation. Will you choose the Outlaw with her trusty lockpick to venture into uncharted territory, or will it be the Sheriff who’s badge could potentially gain the respect of a hesitant resident and land your team some valuable information. Teamwork will allow you to successfully uncover hidden dialogue secrets the residents may be unwilling to share, and explore the secret alcoves of Brimstone’s locations to the fullest.

The Investigation


  • The Streets of Brimstone
    Discover the various locations of Brimstone and explore its depths for clues! From the bustling, grimy saloon, the center of the town’s nightlife where unruly cowboys brawl over card games, to the dust-bowl, tumbleweed ridden main street where shady outlaws lie in wait under high noon. Expect a head scratching journey in this town teeming with ye olde Western locale. There are heaps of secrets to unearth, which will leave you and your friends perplexed as you piece the mystery together.

  • The Residents of Brimstone
    Brimstone’s eclectic cast of characters feature the best and the worst of the Wild West. You will meet the good-for-nothing Mayor hidden away in his studious office, a withered Saloon Owner gossiping away as he shares rumors with his customers, and the high-strung Blacksmith hammering away at his anvil to name but a few. Don’t be fooled however, a culprit lurks among them! Will you be able to tell the good from the bad and the ugly?

Whodunnit?


  • Explore a stylized game world

    Being a side-scrolling RPG, the game features classic point & click gameplay. While this is a well-tested formula, our non-linear story engine and the multiplayer feature make it stand apart from similar games.

  • Fast travel to locations

    Meet the various characters around the town and question them to gain further insight into the town's history, characters and lore.

  • Interrogate the residents

    Who knows what shady past or hidden romance may have occurred behind the scenes! The further you investigate a character, the closer you’ll come to bring to light secrets they may withhold about other residents.

  • Inspect the clues

    A bloody murder weapon is a sure bet to lead you to the truth, or could it be a red herring to throw you off the scent? No doubt a discarded wanted poster holds a hot lead on a potential suspect. However you investigate, a keen eye and quick wit is essential to follow the rabbit hole.

  • Utilize your unique skill

    Using all the tools at your team's disposal is essential to thoroughly investigate Brimstone. The Sheriff's badge is not just for decoration, this trusty tool can be used to gain favor with characters and gather coveted information. The Deputy’s forensic kit will also prove extremely useful in identifying a chaotic crime scene. The Outlaw’s lockpick will be fundamental in unlocking hidden areas. Lastly, the Cowboy’s gun is a sure fire way to intimidate a character, perhaps they’ll share in their best kept secrets, or rumors overheard in the saloon.

  • Be aware of the time limit

    Keep an eye on the clock as you’ll only have a short time to investigate, allocate tasks amongst your party wisely.

  • Review the investigation

    Scrutinize the findings in your case file and determine the truth amongst the lies with your team. In the end you can only settle on one culprit... Be warned, things may get heated!

name: MotorSim 3
detailed_description:
MotorSim 3 is the logical evolution to a 3D game of MotorSim 2, our successful Android App which scores 4'8 stars of 5.

It is a straight line car performance simulator that allows you to configure power, weight and other characteristics as you wish, so you can check how any car behaves (acceleration and top speed).

Before buying:

  • Note this is straight line racing only (no steering).

What You Can Do:

  • Set up a number of values for your car (horsepower, weight, gear rations, drag/CX coefficient an so on).
  • Test the car (straight line only) in 3 different environments.
  • Create races among different cars with distinct configurations.
  • Set the camera in any place you want with respect to any car during the race.
  • Edit car materials and colors.
  • Edit wheels and rims (dimensions, offset, rim design, spokes count, material, color).
  • Edit engine, turbo/supercharger, transmision and gearbox sounds.
  • Modify some car parts.
  • Compare your current car performance with previously recorded ghost.
  • Learn how car acceleration physics work.

Modes:

  • Campaign mode: gain credits and upgrade your car through 270 events.
  • Free mode: set up your cars and create races as you wish (drag races up to 8 cars).

Important Notes:

  • This is an Early Release game whose development is still in progress.
  • This game is done by a single person, so please be patient.
  • Free demo coming soon.

Features to come:

The Official Relase will include the following features.
  • Shared gallery so users can share their settings.
  • Campaign leaderboard.

Features wishlist:

Other crazy features for MotorSim 3 or for maybe a future MotorSim 4 are discussed in the Community Hub.

name: BREAK PATTERN
detailed_description:
Is it viable to make souls-like (or rather souls-lite) shooter? Let's find out :)

BREAK PATTERN is in development by a solo developer. Inspired by soulsborne games and some old school shooters. Minimalistic design with focus on level design, puzzles, combat & platforming.

You have been hired to break into a highly secure system. Your employer prudently erases your memory to be sure that if you get caught no one can trace him back. Let's hope he backed up your data.

Anyway, go from the lowest security levels up to the system core. And when you will get there you will know what to do.


Solve a lot of puzzles.


Survive against many threats.


Deal with tricky bosses.

name: BLACK ACE
detailed_description:
Competitive multiplayer match with vehicles and arcade elements that makes the gameplay unpredictable. Select and customize your operators and your weapons. Choose a strategy to win in a open map. Became a master of all game modes. Create your clan and level up until the BLACK ACE level!

BLACK ACE is characterized by competitive, adrenaline and funny matchs up to 20 players that challenge each other at the same time. Choose between different game modes from the classic to the original ones. The open map push you and your team to choose carefully the strategy to win. Exploit different types of vehicles to surprise your opponent. Your team can shoot from Helicopters and land vehicles. Kill enemy in a row to unlock Kill Streak like UAV or Helicopter IA. Choose from third person or first person in realtime during the gameplay. Level up, gain coins and buy your weapons. Customize them to improve their potential. Customize your operator and create a clan where gather your mates.

Becomes the new BLACK ACE.

name: Cyberpunk for Clip maker
detailed_description:
Cyberpunk for Clip Maker contain many different complete cyberpunk scenes for making excellent art images, manga, visual novels, stories, comics, videos, films and clips. Or just have a fun.

All content of this DLC (switching between scenes) will be available directly from the game, in the "Esc" menu where you are making settings of the whole game.

Please note that content of this DLC will be updating. After buying the DLC you will get all updates for free.

Please post images or links to your 18+ art in the Discord, because of post public nudity art is not allowed in the discussions on Steam

name: Giraffe and Annika Art Book
detailed_description:
Giraffe & Annika Art Book


This is an art book containing illustrations from Giraffe & Annika, character settings, background settings, design materials, bonus illustrations, all Meowsterpieces from the game, unused settings, and more.
File format: PDF; full color 94p

How to View:

Right-click on "Giraffe and Annika" under "Manage" in the Library section of the Steam menu, then select "Browse Local Files". The files are contained in the "Giraffe and Annika Art Book" folder.

name: Bunker Builder Simulator
detailed_description:
CHECK MORE GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1864880/Roman_Triumph_Survival_City_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1477700/Project_Wunderwaffe/

About the Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1239320/Animal_Shelter/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1826460/Shopping_Mall_Renovator/


Acquire contracts, build, equip and decorate bunkers in this engaging builder. Observe your projects coming alive to provide safety and comfort to your clients!



Dig a hole! Most of your contracts will take place in clients gardens. Building a bunker will require providing a stable foundation made with your chosen materials. Durability of your whole project will depend on that choice.



The game will provide many tools you will be able to use to accomplish your work efficiently. You will have to cut, weld, plaster, and those are just a few of the tasks awaiting you. In time you will acquire better tools that will allow for faster work, which means taking more contracts and getting rich quicker!



You will get access to a wide array of items to fulfill your customers needs. Furniture, armature, kitchen appliances, boardgames and many, many more.



Build bunkers that will ensure safety from any danger!

name: Death By Tomato
detailed_description:
In this VR only game you try to avoid getting hit by Tomatoes and other food. Cats might also be thrown at you. You can slice food
being thrown at you or you can catch it, but if you slice a cat you loose a lot of health points. If you catch a Cat you get all your
health back. There are 5 difficulties with 5 unlockable weapons and 10 levels with music.

name: The Hike
detailed_description:
The Hike is a first person horror/survival game in which you must survive the horrors that start while investigating a mysterious emergency message in a simple hike through the Mount Grandious National Park. Your chance of making it back to society relies only on your legs, you're no fighter.

Synopsis


Acting irrationally after hearing a mysterious emergency message, experienced hiker John Lake decides to go and investigate for himself, in what should be an easy hike for him. Once there, he realizes that he has made a big mistake, finding out the hard way that the ranger station hid details about the real situation as his fading hope of making it back to society relies entirely on a flashlight and his legs.

Features


  • True Survival Experience - You are no fighter. If you want to get back to society, your only chance is to keep running.
  • Immersive Graphics - Realistic graphics featuring 4k textures and immersive sounds.
  • Puzzled Gameplay - The puzzles in the game will make the player think in creative ways in order to escape.
  • Darkness - You mostly rely on your flashlight, without it, you are screwed.
  • Lore - In the process of escaping, learn about the story of the much feared woods of the Mount Grandious peak.

name: The Wakers
detailed_description:
Who Are the Wakers?

Great things are waking in this world, and it has stirred a mission in you. It's time to wake the giant spirits. As all initiates know, there's only 3 things you need to do to: ring the bell, read the scroll and light the candle.

Easy right?

Now just keep doing that forever as you journey through this mysterious reality! Are you waking the spirits or are they waking you?

The Wakers is a Relaxing, Mystical Puzzle Journey

Instantly accessible yet richly creative puzzle gameplay where each level is a compact, meditative space of coves, groves and clearings. Simply orbit your camera around the centre of each level and point-and-click anything from machinery to plants, creatures and magic spells to discover a huge array of puzzle gameplay, giving you amazing freedom to find your own solutions!


• wind gears to rearrange architecture
• magically transform special polymorphable objects at the click of a button
• read magical scrolls to cast spells
• guide laser beams to activate, melt or cut through objects
• shoot projectiles and rearrange walls to ricochet things to where you need them
• shoot flaming arrows to spread fires, spread currents through electrical devices
• lure in or scare away creatures to help you
• destroy crumbling architecture
• decode ciphers
• use the natural elements – click a cloud to make it rain, or find ways to conjure wind, water or fire
• and so much more to discover – leave no stone unturned!

Features

• beautiful, serene meditative environments and music
• creative problem solving – multiple ways to solve many of the game's levels
• alternate outcomes – all levels can be solved by ringing the bell, reading the scroll and lighting the candle, but if you're a clever player you can find other secret portals that reward you with access to secret levels in the overworld
• rescue all the secret miniature spirits hidden throughout the game
• short and sweet – the main path only takes a few hours to complete

name: WrestleQuest
detailed_description:
THE ULTIMATE PRO WRESTLING ADVENTURE
Powerbomb and piledrive your way through a massive pixel art universe where professional wrestling and RPG fantasy collide.



WRESTLE WITH DESTINY
Take a hero’s journey... in tights! Upgrade from aspiring rookie to world champ by training, learning, glamming, and SLAMMING to the top of the pro wrestling food chain.

YOUR IDOLS AWAIT
Draw inspiration from wrestling icons like Jake the Snake Roberts, "Macho Man" Randy Savage, and even André the Giant. Explore worlds based on their lofty careers.



HEART-POUNDING ACTION
Classic RPG combat meet wrestling moves, match styles, and gimmicks galore.

GOOD GUYS, BAD GUYS, LIZARDS, ROBOTS, AND MORE
Wild realms, exotic monsters, action figure fighters, and spandexed allies await as this fantasy goes beyond the ring.



GEAR UP ON YOUR WAY TO THE TOP
Choose your moves, style, taunts, and even your entrance as you learn what it takes to be the cream of the crop in the pro wrestling world of your dreams.

name: Silverblood
detailed_description:
*Trailer and screenshots are from an early demo version of the game. New and updated content coming soon!*

Six years after leaving her family to join the Sisters of the Whiterock Coven, young Edith is anxious to finally return home. But first, she has to pass her Trial of Ascension—a harrowing task bestowed by her patron deity, made all the more insufferable by an unexpected companion: Colette, a fellow acolyte and Edith’s long-time bully. Together, the two must complete the Trial, no matter the consequences.

Then, when it’s all over, Edith can hopefully reunite with her family… *if* she survives.

Features

Silverblood is a fantasy visual novel set in the colorful nation of Alderell, where the choices you make change the outcome of the story—and magic is always a solution to your problems. Silverblood boasts the following features:

  • Meaningful choices that impact the narrative and 4 unique endings
  • Charmingly gloomy storybook aesthetics featuring original hand-drawn art
  • Dramatic timed encounters that test your skills in battle, stealth, and more
  • Draw magic runes to cast spells—every choice has a magical solution
  • Take a breather with Edith to enjoy the scenery and smell the flowers
  • Fully-voiced cinematics and partially-voiced gameplay
  • A beautiful original score by Orpheo Fenn of Faefield Productions

Release Schedule

Silverblood is a fantasy-drama visual novel set to release episodically on a monthly basis. It contains 7 chapters.
  • Chapter one will be available for free as a standalone demo! Sample Edith's story before you purchase Silverblood.
  • Chapter two will be available for purchase on initial release. With your one-time purchase, you will receive all future content updates at no additional cost, including all 7 chapters of Silverblood.
about_the_game:
*Trailer and screenshots are from an early demo version of the game. New and updated content coming soon!*

Six years after leaving her family to join the Sisters of the Whiterock Coven, young Edith is anxious to finally return home. But first, she has to pass her Trial of Ascension—a harrowing task bestowed by her patron deity, made all the more insufferable by an unexpected companion: Colette, a fellow acolyte and Edith’s long-time bully. Together, the two must complete the Trial, no matter the consequences.

Then, when it’s all over, Edith can hopefully reunite with her family… *if* she survives.

name: Mannequin The Passing
detailed_description:
Mannequin The Passing is a single-player psychological horror game where the only goal is to get from the starting point to the finishing point. Mannequins are along the way to the end, with some being alive and wanting to stop you. The only way to tell which mannequins are villainous is by the subtle (and not so subtle) clues when you're not looking in their direction. Some may move, look, and change their pose as you use your observational skills to get through the game. Move from mannequin to mannequin in a frightening walking experience.



Features

  • A tense, frightening experience you can play at your own pace:

    No time limits, no need to rush, just observation and patience to get through.

  • Randomized placement of evil mannequins:

    No stage will be the same.

  • A leveling system to unlock more in the game:

    You need to play to unlock stages, difficulties, and achievements.

  • Customise your difficulty:

    Five different difficulties across the Map and Mannequins to be unlocked.

  • Twelve stages with six themes:

    Six themes stages with a small and larger variant.

  • Hidden Items to find:

    Each stage has a hidden jewel that unlocks new cosmetic skins for the mannequins.

  • Story Mode:

    A Story Mode is now in the game that has set difficulties and events going through the mystery of the Mannequins.
    (Please note: The default mode is 'Stage Mode', Story Mode was added in after launch to include more in the game.)
