name: 占星VR / Horoscope
detailed_description:
关于问天阁系列

  • 这是一款意在讲述中国传统天文学、传统文化和古代星占的系列软件
  • 溯古追今,采用新视角感受传统文化。

    问天阁-占星

  • 本作过可VR设备体验沉浸式观星，为传统文化爱好者及星占爱好者打造；
  • 这款软件兼具了科普性和娱乐性，能从更高的维度来展示浩瀚的星空，非常适合压力大，需要放松疗愈的现代人，用星情来疗愈心情；
  • 观星场景都经过精心打磨，皇城的恢弘、山脊上的宝塔、雪域的尼玛石以及观星台上的石雕、图腾都极具古代东方神韵；
  • 拥有超过30万字的信息和全天超过6000颗肉眼可见恒星来表现"星宿"；
  • 星体呈现有严谨的天文数据支持；
  • 复原了古天文学中的 黄道、天赤道、星团、星云、银河、三垣、四象和二十八宿；

    不要错过的精心设计

  • 点击【本命】或者【缘系】查看传统占卜中‘星宿本命解读’的基本表述方式，以及‘星宿关系测算’的基本运作方式；
  • 进入【须弥】场景中‘调整时间轴’观察1年365天的行星运行规律，了解支干历法及节气的根据；

    关于软件中记载的星占术

  • 源于藏传密宗《大藏经》中的《宿曜经》是已流传了上千年的一套十分神秘的占算体系。

    为什么做这样的软件？

    造一场璀璨星空的视觉盛宴，造一趟优秀传统文化的精神之旅，也是造一次漂泊心灵向浩瀚宇宙的皈依。
    这个作品的用意是探索如何更好的表现经典，以及如何展现有关“星宿”文化的视觉意境；
    ‘星宿’和广为流传的‘十二星座’不同。我也想让更多人知道我们祖传的占算体系，也很棒
    做为一个传统占算主题，并非强调其科学性，而是设计了一个巧妙的形式直观展现出占算的过程和结构关系；
    专注非游戏类型创作，希望大家更多的从一个文学艺术和文化层面来观赏、指导；

    《占星》只是个开始~

    敬请期待后续更新~

  • 拥有超过30万字的信息和全天超过6000颗肉眼可见恒星来表现"星宿"；
  • 星体呈现有严谨的天文数据支持；
  • 复原了古天文学中的 黄道、天赤道、星团、星云、银河、三垣、四象和二十八宿；

    不要错过的精心设计

  • 点击【本命】或者【缘系】查看传统占卜中‘星宿本命解读’的基本表述方式，以及‘星宿关系测算’的基本运作方式；
  • 进入【须弥】场景中‘调整时间轴’观察1年365天的行星运行规律，了解支干历法及节气的根据；

    关于软件中记载的星占术

  • 源于藏传密宗《大藏经》中的《宿曜经》是已流传了上千年的一套十分神秘的占算体系。

    为什么做这样的软件？

    造一场璀璨星空的视觉盛宴，造一趟优秀传统文化的精神之旅，也是造一次漂泊心灵向浩瀚宇宙的皈依。
    这个作品的用意是探索如何更好的表现经典，以及如何展现有关“星宿”文化的视觉意境；
    ‘星宿’和广为流传的‘十二星座’不同。我也想让更多人知道我们祖传的占算体系，也很棒
    做为一个传统占算主题，并非强调其科学性，而是设计了一个巧妙的形式直观展现出占算的过程和结构关系；
    专注非游戏类型创作，希望大家更多的从一个文学艺术和文化层面来观赏、指导；

    《占星》只是个开始~

    敬请期待后续更新~
short_description: 人类各文明都起源于对星空的观察，了解东方天文学是探寻东方文明起源的捷径 解锁千年藏传占星学的奥秘，可以从更高维度了解自己及与他人的内在联系 感受神秘的东方传统天文学中“天人合一，道法自然”的独特魅力.用浩瀚唯美的星空疗愈心情，滋养心灵

name: Bicycle Mechanic Simulator
detailed_description:
Run your bicycle workshop and repair bicycles by your own hand. Tighten the screws, adjust the chain, and then do some personalized printing. Ready to assemble frame, derailleur, flywheel, pedal, brake, handle... . It's not just your sweat that makes you a bicycle repair master, but your attention to detail and skills.

Highly realistic parts for assembling


In Bicycle Mechanic Simulator, we reconstruct a large number of parts in detail, including frames, spokes, flywheels, chains, disc brakes, pedals, and more. The parts you know and the parts you don't know will give you the fun of assembling a bike in the game. Use different assembly tools to transform a bike from a scattering of parts into a shiny, stylish bike.

Experience the whole process of bicycle repair


Test, repair, maintenance, assembly, painting, conditioning. Complete the bicycle repair process in your bicycle workshop and immerse yourself in the sweat and smell of engine oil. Every order is a challenge. Don't forget to expand your workshop and buy new tools and parts so that you can get more orders and business.

Collect lots of different types of bicycle


As the owner of a bicycle workshop, you are also a collector of bicycles. When you see a bicycle you like, don't hesitate to buy it and make it part of your garage collection. Every unique bicycle may have a unique story behind it. A bicycle made with your hands can also become a hot work of art in the market.

Roll up your sleeves! You must be professional enough to create a shiny perfect bike.

name: The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log1
detailed_description:
The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child -Log1 (Play time : 30 minutes)

Two silent wanderers
6 full chapters
A game of exploration and adventure

A lost child, drifting in an odd husk, lands at a mysterious structure.
Clione, a manufactured doll you encounter.
You are Clione.
Your purpose? Protect this lost child.
What awaits you at the top of the slowly sinking structure?

Log2 is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1877760/_Log2/

Log3 is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1892340/_Log3/

Log4 is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1923060/_Log4/

Log5 is here!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1926920/_Log5/

Major features
You can play with the keyboard or controller.
Actions include "running", "walking", "jumping", "climbing", etc., and you only have to press a button depending on the situation.
Operate some machine, investigate, and get information from the people you meet.
Lost child are at risk during their actions.
At this time, if you want to move the lost child, you can approach the lost child and "hold hands", and you can move together.
When a lost child comes into contact with water, a mysterious creature called ankh may appear and be attacked.
Clione's weapon is Taser only.
You will be able to fire after charging.
Aim with the Shift key or the left trigger.
Fire with the Space key or the A button.
When locked on, the aim will turn red and the taser bullet will be able to track.

What is a "Sinking Structure"?
What is the true identity of "Clione"?
Where did the "Lost Child" come from?

The main pleasure is to find out the true story with the information obtained from various experiences.

-------------------------------
"The Sinking Structure, Clione, and Lost Child"
This is a serialized game with 6 chapters, Log1 to Log6.
After the release of Log1 on February 17, it will be released about every other week.

Public schedule
Log1 / Released! / no charge
Log2 / Released! / no charge
Log3 / March 10 / no charge
Log4 / undecided / no charge
Log5 / undecided / no charge
Log6 / undecided / undecided

-------------------------------
Start with Log1.
It continues from Log1 to Log6.
-------------------------------
